description: THE HOMEFully renovated and interior-designed home featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a separate WC and a cloakroom, reflecting an ethos of discreet luxury. The emphasis has been on balancing traditional craft and attention to detail with modern luxury fixtures and fittings.High-quality materials – stone, marble and walnut – and top of the range fittings by Bulthaup, Gaggenau and Poliform have been used. A separate steam shower, especially selected from the Hansgrohe range.Muted colour scheme spacious reception, continues into the kitchen with the introduction of high quality and contemporary materials.The kitchen porcelain and stone have been carefully chosen for their textures and to provide a setting of neutrality and luxury to which residents can add their own personal touch.Brushed stainless steel upholds the understated theme of quality.Walnut flooring is laid in reception rooms and hallways, stone in bathrooms and luxurious New Zealand wool carpet in all the bedrooms.Spacious private wrap around deck, accessible from all rooms.Home is hard wired for Terrestrial TV + Satellite TV with a data and telephone line, ensuring all apartments have connectivity for audio visual and data link requirements.All rooms are hard wired for sound and include an iPod docking system and speakers in the reception rooms.FITZROVIA APARTMENTSCaliza Capri limestone facade, with zinc panels at high level where the façade line sits backHigh specification double height entrance lobby leading directly onto the landscaped courtyard garden24/ 7 Concierge ServicePrivate landscaped courtyard gardenSecure underground car parkingSecure bicycle storageCCTV cameras operate at ground floor level and in the corridorsColour video entry phone and door bell to each apartmentSustainability- The apartments have been awarded an Ecohomes rating of ‘very good- LOCATIONFitzrovia Apartments is located where Fitzrovia meets Regent-s Park, close to Georgian Marylebone and within walking distance of Oxford Street and Bond Street. The academic quarter of Bloomsbury lies a little distance to the east and Covent Garden, with its distinctive blend of culture, entertainment and indulgence, is just around the corner. The development is located at a pivotal point in London, with both the City and West End in easy reach. Road connections for Fitzrovia Apartments are excellent and two tube stations are close at hand. There is easy access to major rail termini with the fast link to Heathrow at Paddington and Eurostar services from St Pancras, as well as services to the Midlands, the North and Scotland. Typical travel times(All journey times from Warren Street/Great Portland Street tube. Data provided from Transport for London and Eurostar websites.King-s Cross /St Pancras International - 6 minutesKnightsbridge - 12 minutesOxford Circus - 2 minutesPaddington - 10 minutesBank - 15 minutesWaterloo - 8 minutesWestminster - 11 minutesHeathrow - 41 minutesParis - 2 hours 15 minutes  AN EXQUISITE LIFEFitzrovia is a London village which offers a different slant on living in the City. It is at the heart of the capital, yet has a community and lifestyle of its own, distinct from that of the West End. The area has a lively street scene, animated by restaurants and bars, with art galleries and a unique and extensive range of shops reinforcing its distinctive character. In short, Fitzrovia is a place to enjoy London life to the full. RESTAURANTSRIBA Café, Villandry, Archipelagio, Cilantro, Gaucho, Ping Pong, Fino, Roka, Mennula, Bam-Bou, Suka at Sanderson, Roux at the Landau, Le Relais De Venise, L-Entrecote, L-Autre Pied, Paul Rothe, St Christopher-s, Place, Busaba, Princess Garden, Ristorante Semplice, La Petite Maison, Thai Square, Hibiscus, Sketch, The Riding House, Ibenca, De Martino BARSCharlotte St. Blues, Shochu Lounge, London Cocktail Club, The Long Bar, Loom Bar, The Social, Annex 3, Artesian, Match Bar, The Phoenix RETAILBulgari, Selfridges, John Lewis, Hamleys, Jamie Aston, Heal-s, The Conran Shop, Diptyque, Daunt Books, Skandium, Aveda, Le Fromagerie, Jane Packer, VV Rouleaux CULTURE & LEARINGFitzrovia Apartments is close to Bloomsbury, home to the central institutions of the University of London and the campus of University College London, one of Britain-s leading universities. Major medical research facilities are based around UCL and University College Hospital. The University of Westminster has sites on Marylebone Road and New Cavendish Street. Given its long association with artists, it isn-t surprising that Fitzrovia is home to a growing number of galleries – Rebecca Hossack, Curwen, October and the Store Street Gallery are amongst well known GALLERIESGallery at 94, Rebecca Hossack Art, Gallery, The David Roberts Art, Foundation,Mummery + Schnelle, Rollo Alexandre Pollazzon, Woolff Gallery, Coningsby Gallery, Lilley Josh Gallery, The Approach, Stuart Shave/Modern Art, Alison Jacques Gallery

description: Well-presented, MODERN one DOUBLE BEDROOM apartment located on the first floor of the popular Leven Wharf Development in E14. Benefiting from a high specification throughout and complete with wooden flooring, this spacious apartment has a FULLY FITTED OPEN PLAN kitchen/living area, PRIVATE BALCONY and well-proportioned double bedroom.Settled on a 0.5 hectare* waterfront site is the development of Leven Wharf. Leven Wharf is a 5 minute DLR journey to Canary Wharf - which is on the biggest business districts in Europe - playing host to a number of major banks, professional service firms and media organisations. Canary Wharf is not just for business - but for play also. Canary Wharf has become a destination in its own right not only for shopping but for gastronomic and cultural pursuits also. Leven Wharf is close to DLR and Underground Services at Canning Town, Langdon Park, All Saints and East India Quay Stations. Each gives you easy access to Canary Wharf, London City Airport, Stratford International for Eurostar service and Bank for the City. Langdon Park DLR station is the closest of all these stations - being a mere 7 minute* walk away.

description: CBRE Residential is delighted to bring to the market this exquisite three bedroom apartment to rent in 190 Strand. The development benefits from a concierge service, gym, sauna, swimming pool and a virtual golf room.The apartment, located on the third floor comprises a large open plan living room complete with bespoke modern kitchen and access to a balcony, a large master bedroom with walk in wardrobe and access to a fully tiled modern en-suite bathroom, a second double bedroom boasting fitted wardrobes, a third double bedroom, a second fully tiled family bathroom. The apartment is finished to the highest of specifications and is in a development that is highly sought after.Gladstone House is perfectly located on the Strand and benefits from the many shops, bars and restaurants the area has to offer. It is a short walk to the Covent garden Piazza and also the river Thames. There are a number of great transport links close by including; Temple (circle & District Line / 0.1 miles) and Embankment (Bakerloo, District, Northern & Circle Lines / 0.3 miles). There are also a number of bus routes within close proximity.The apartment is approximately 1520 Sq. Ft. (142 sq. m) and has an EPC rating B. There is a requirement of a 5 week (rent equivalent under £50,000 per annum) deposit for new and renewed tenancies (or 6 weeks if the annual rent is £50,000 or more).For more information about our fees please visit our web-sites Tenant Fees page located under the Rent tab. description: Video viewing available upon request. CBRE Residential are proud to market this three double bedroom flat to rent in Soho, located in a recently constructed development in the heart of central London. The building was designed by Robin Partington & Partners with interiors from Martin Brudnizki Design Studio and features Concierge, gym facilities, laundry, cleaning and room services all available from the iconic Soho Hotel.This apartment comprises of three large bedrooms, all complete with fitted wardrobes, a large open plan living room complete with a fully equipped bespoke modern kitchen and two fully tiled modern bathrooms. description: Available in what will be one of the tallest and most renowned residential buildings in Europe. Set within the heart of London's business district, Canary Wharf, E14. The apartment comprises an open plan living space with a kitchen which includes Siemens appliances, Reconstituted stone work surfaces, glass splash-backs and handle-free storage. There is a high specification bathroom suite and a separate bedroom space. The apartment will enjoy underfloor heating & comfort cooling.Residents could have access to South Quay Plazas exclusive Residents' Club Lounge on the 56th floor, 24 hour concierge services, Terrace areas, bar facilities, board rooms, a screening room, bars cafe, onsite restaurants as well as London's highest communal garden.There is an array of leisure facilities on offer: 160 sq/m swimming pool, residents gymnasium, a resistance training circuit as well as a spa, private treatment rooms, sauna & steam room.South Quay Plaza is a development truly unique to the Canary Wharf area. Located just a few moments from the heart of London's financial district, it will stand within 2.6 acres of beautiful landscaped gardens and over 150 new trees, feeling like an urban oasis. At the heart of the park, new cafes and restaurants will provide places to meet and socialise, all by the water's edge of the South Dock.Canary Wharf is possibly London's best- served district for transport. Its under- ground station (Jubilee Line) is only a 600-metre walk from South Quay Plaza. Directly opposite South Quay Plaza is South Quay DLR (Docklands Light Railway) station, only a short journey to London City Airport.Holding Deposit: £1,050BrochuresBrochure

description: PERFECT FOR SHARERS!! A 3 double bedroom, neutrally decorated property located in popular St John's area of Tunbridge Wells within a 10 minute walk to Tunbridge Wells town centre and Main Line Station.    This bright and airy character property has LARGE rooms with high ceilings, sash windows.   To the first floor is a fitted kitchen with grey high gloss units with an intergrated fridge/freezer, oven, and hob. There is a fantastic size living room with a feautre fireplace and wooden shutters; along with a good size double bedroom.   To the second floor are two further large double bedrooms, a shower room and large landing with an airing cupboard and washing machine.    The property is available Unfurnished.  IMPORTANT NOTE:  When you apply for a tenancy there will be a holding deposit to pay - ask our branch staff for further details of this fee and other fees which may become payable during the lifetime of your tenancy. description:
A modern 3 bed apartment with spectacular views of the London Eye and River Thames.
DescriptionSouthbank Place is one of the most desirable developments that central London has to offer with apartments now available in the highly anticipated Casson Square. This spacious 3 bedroom, 23rd floor apartment comprises an open-plan reception/ dining room offering incredible views over London including The London Eye, St Paul's and the river.The modern fully-fitted kitchen features Miele appliances including a dishwasher, integrated wine cooler, full height fridge-freezer. The bedroom contains ample floor to ceiling built-in wardrobes and floor-to-ceiling windows, allowing the spaces to be flooded with light. The main bedroom offers river views, an ensuite with bath and separate shower, and walk in wardrobe.The second bedroom has a further ensuite with ample storage. The third bedroom offers plenty of storage space and is serviced by the additional shower room in the hallway.Wooden flooring features throughout the apartments along with triple glazed windows, cooling & heating system, and a washer/dryer. The kitchen also offers built in coffee machines and a wine fridge.Residents' will have access to the lounge and cinema room located on level one. Onsite facilities include a swimming pool, sauna & gym as well as a allocated car parking space in the underground carpark.Casson Square has a dedicated security provision including a 24 hour concierge and apartment video entry. The development offers site wide CCT security with centralised motoring, a centralised concierge/security office and 24 hour security staff.LocationSouthbank Place consists of a mixture of prestigious residential and commercial buildings encircling the existing and notable Shell Tower building, with each residential building designed by five notable architects. Offering a selection of high-quality studios, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and penthouses, Southbank Place's architecture is designed by Squire and Partners and Grid Architects, while its interiors are designed by the award-winning Johnson Nayor Interiors. The development benefits an onsite entrance into Waterloo Station which holds the Northern Line, Bakerloo Line, Jubilee Line, Waterloo & City line and mainline trains. Local points of interest include, the UKs largest cinema screen at the BFI IMAX, London's Southbank, Royal Festival Hall, Hayward Gallery, National Theatre, Young and Old Vic Theatres, the Garden Museum and London Eye.Square Footage: 1,648 sq ft

description:
A brand new third floor furnished apartment in the sought after Horlicks Factory building.
DescriptionNewly available to the rental market this is a beautifully finished apartment in the sought after original Factory building which has just completed.Within The Factory the apartment is on the third floor of the building with both lift and stair access. The apartment features a modern open plan reception room with hard wood flooring. The kitchen is beautifully finished with integrated Bosch appliances and views into the courtyard.The principal bedroom has built in wardrobes and the bathroom features a shower over bath.The property comes with new furniture. The building contains a concierge, gym and cinema room.Please note there is no car parking with this apartment.LocationSituated in the heart of the M4 Thames Valley and close to the main High Street of Slough with its shopping centres, restaurants and bars.Nearby Windsor and Eton offer a truly British history experience with their romantic combination of antique shops, historic hotspots and traditional tea rooms.Slough station offers direct trains to London Paddington and Reading in 30 minutes and 25 minutes respectively. Crossrail is now fully open, providing faster connections to Central London locations. Bus services to Heathrow can be accessed from the high street with an approximate journey time of 30 minutes. For those travelling via car, the town of Windsor is situated approximately 4.8 km (3 miles) south, while Junction 6 of the M4, is located approximately 3.2 km (2 miles) to the south, provides access to key destinations that include London, Reading and Maidenhead.

description: Located on the 6th floor of Amelia Mansions, this light and bright, two bedroom, two bathroom home is available to rent fully-furnished from 29th October.This East Village apartment sits within  Portlands – a popular spot thanks to its tree-lined boulevards and tranquil water features. The double bedroom comes complete with built-in wardrobes, a chest of draws and side-tables. While kitchens are fully integrated with appliances including a multi-functional oven and induction hob. A private balcony connects the open plan kitchen and living area to the great outdoors – overlooking East Village’s parks and wetlands with unrivalled skyline views.Wi-Fi is included and set up for when you move in, getting you connected right away. All Get Living homes have an energy efficiency rating of B or C, helping conserve energy for the planet, and your pocket. Our homes come already connected to the District heating and hot water system meaning no space-hogging boiler in your home. Please note that this means, you cannot switch supplier.  Additional information:Pet friendly – all applicants with a pet must sign our pet policy agreement Wi-Fi included – all other utilities including electricity, heating and hot water to be paid separately by the resident Parking and storage pods are available to rent at additional cost – please ask our team for more informationCouncil tax band - this property is within band C (Newham Council) Monthly rental cost advertised is based on 36-month tenancies, with break clause. For 12-month tenancies, please speak to our teamA Security Deposit equal to five weeks’ rent, may be payable for this property. The deposit will be held by the Tenancy Deposit Scheme:   Please note photos are for illustrative purposes only - layouts and features may vary.    Amelia Mansions

description:
Beautiful two bedroom property on the third floor of a period building.
DescriptionThis property is located on the third floor of a period building. Situated in Mayfair, one of London’s most exclusive neighbourhoods. Aldford Street is a rare gem that blends a modern apartment with Georgian architecture. It’s a fantastic opportunity to live in a piece of London’s history while enjoying contemporary luxury.The property features a principal bedroom with an en suite bathroom, a further double bedroom and bathroom. There is a large living and dining room full of natural light and a fully equipped modern kitchen. The property also has a lift.LocationAldford Street is located south of Mount Street and is conveniently situated for the world-class shopping, renowned art galleries and Michelin-starred restaurants of Central Mayfair. The greenery of Hyde Park is a short walk away.Square Footage: 1,160 sq ft

description:
Picturesque farmhouse overlooking fields in semi-rural location
DescriptionA period farmhouse beautifully positioned on the West Wycombe estate surrounded by countryside. The property comprises; porch, open plan kitchen / dining room and sitting room with open fireplace. To the first floor you have two double bedrooms and family bathroom. To the second floor you have a large double bedroom, cupboard space and en-suite bathroom. Externally the property has parking for several cars and mature gardens which surround the property.LocationThe property is situated on the edge of the pretty village of West Wycombe in a private, rural location yet within easy reach of both the M4 and M40 motorways with convenient access to central London, Birmingham, Heathrow, and Gatwick Airports.  Rail links are also excellent, with mainline services from High Wycombe to London Marylebone and Marlow (via Maidenhead) to London Paddington.  The pretty riverside towns of Marlow and Henley-on-Thames are a short distance with more extensive shopping facilities in High Wycombe, Windsor, and Reading.Square Footage: 1,374 sq ft

DirectionsFrom our Marlow office head north-east on West Street towards Town Lane, at the roundabout take the 1st exit onto Spittal Street and at the second roundabout take the 1st exit onto Dean Street. Continue for 4.9 miles, turn right onto Bolter End Lane, after 0.8 miles continue onto Chipps hill and after 0.7 miles turn right onto the Oxford Road. After 1.2 miles turn right onto Toweridge Lane and after 0.5 miles the property will be on your right hand side. Postcode: HP14 3AT

description:
A stunning one bedroom luxury apartment, which has been tastefully upgraded internally. 
DescriptionLocated in one of Canary Wharfs most desirable residential developments, is this stunning one bedroom apartment, which offers approximately 612 sq ft of well presented living accommodation. Internally, the owner has made various tasteful upgrades, making this perfect for a busy professional looking to purchase an apartment which is ready to move straight into. A generous entrance hallway provides fitted storage, then leading into a sizeable open plan living area, encompassing a stylish fitted kitchen with high spec appliances and a breakfast bar. The double bedroom features fitted wardrobes and remote controlled curtains, and there is also a luxurious re-fitted shower room, benefiting from underfloor heating, a mirror/TV and ceiling speakers, on offer. Large floor to ceiling windows absorb masses of natural light and enhance the impressive outlook over London. Residents will also benefit from access to a 24 hour concierge, and the ability to order room service from the Marriott hotel, which is based on the lower floors of the building.This property can come furnished or unfurnished.LocationLocated within just 0.2 miles of Canary Wharf, West India Quay is perfectly located for a variety of local shops, trendy bars and restaurants. Both the DLR and Jubilee line are within 0.4 miles offering access to Bank, City Airport and Greenwich all within less than 20 minutes. The newly opened Elizabeth line is just a stone's throw away, further aiding swift connectivity throughout the capital and beyondAll times and distances are approximate.Square Footage: 612 sq ft
Leasehold with approximately 980 years remaining.

description: Property Reference: 1826327.An amazing, large, bright and modern studio flat with private back garden, located in Willesden just 5 minutes from Dollis Hill tube station and with excellent 24 hours bus links.  The studio is suitable for a single professional and has a private, modern full size kitchen, built in wardrobe, a bed, desk and one office chair. A wall mounted flat screen TV with remote is also included. The studio has a private shower, access to a private garden and an old style outside toilet.  Access to use laundry machine in the communal areas.  ALL INCLUSIVE/NO BILLS All bills are included in the rent such as gas, electricity, water, council tax and fast speed broadband. TV socket with Freesat available.  TRANSPORT (ZONE 3 Dollis Hill, Jubilee Line, Buses 98, 52 etc.) • 15 mins to Baker Street (Jubilee Line) • 17 mins to Bond Street (Jubilee Line) • Night bus N98 to Oxford street and central London runs regularly  LOCAL AMENITIES • The beautiful Gladstone Park just 10 min walk away for outdoor sports andre-creative activities • Corner shop and off licence just seconds away with late opening hours • Post Office and huge Sainsbury within walking distance on the High Street • 12 min walk to Willesden Green Sport Center  This is a great opportunity to join a new, fresh and modern studio that would suit a professional, NON SMOKING, independent and considerate person. Please note that this is a non smoking property and smokers are not suitable to rent this studio. No pets but plants and goldfish welcome! No couples. No students. No agents.  PARKING Even though the property does not have off street parking, it is possible to buy a residential permit to be able to park on the street, just outside the property, if you have a car and need parking near by.  THE RENT The rent is to be paid on monthly basis in advance, on the 25th each month, for the coming month.  PRIVATE LANDLORD. 1 MONTH DEPOSIT AND 1 MONTH RENT REQUIRED PLUS REFERENCES.SOLVENT PROFESSIONALS ONLY. 6 MONTH CONTRACT APPLIES, TERMS AVAILABLE FOR REPLACING YOURSELF EARLY IF THE NEED ARISES. THEREFORE THE MINIMUM STAY IS JUST 2 MONTHS JUST IN CASE YOUR PERSONAL CIRCUMSTANCES WOULD REQUIRE YOU TO MOVE OUT AND REPLACE YOURSELF EARLY. Feel free to contact for more infoSummary & Exclusions:- Rent Amount: £1,175.00 per month (£271.15 per week)- Deposit / Bond: £1,175.00- 1 Bedrooms- 1 Bathrooms- Property comes furnished- Available to move in from 07 September, 2023- Minimum tenancy term is 2 months- Maximum number of tenants is 1- No Students- No Pets, sorry- No Smokers- Not Suitable for Families / Children- Bills Included- Property has parking- Property has garden access- EPC Rating: Currently Being Obtained  If calling, please quote reference: 1826327  Fees:You will not be charged any admin fees. ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! ** Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week.

description: Property Reference: 1821601.We are happy to offer this delightful 4 bedroom, 1 bathroom detached house in a great location.It is situated on the Petts Wood /Orpington borders. It is an amazing  Tardis - smaller on the outside but large on the inside. As you will see from the plan it is larger than it first looks from the front, its over 1000 sq feet of living space.10 minute walk to Petts Wood Station (zone 5) - Frequent trains to London Bridge, Waterloo & Charing Cross,also Victoria.OR  15 minute walk (or 5 minute bus) to Orpington Station (zone 6).Available to view this property benefits from off road parking, together with a 60 foot secluded garden. Property is offered unfurnished. Newly decorated with new bathroom, all carpeting and new boiler. Consisting of 3 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom, living room, large kitchen diner and conservatory all on one level.Within the school catchment area of Crofton Lane School, Darrick Wood School, Newlands School & St Olaves.Petts Wood is a suburban town within the M25 (exit 4) and ideally situated for access to the motorway network and the nearby railway station. The town high street has a comprehensive range of shops and facilities. Orpington is a nearby 5 minute drive  including the Walnuts Mall and Odeon cinema. Sports facilities are catered for with the Walnuts Leisure Centre, golf courses, football and rugby clubs all within the area. A short way out of town you will find larger chain shops at the Nugent Retail Park as well as the large DIY stores and big name retailers at the industrial parks on Sevenoaks Way. Larger shopping centres at Bluewater and Bromley can also be found within 9 miles drive or bus ride.We may be prepared to consider partial LHA. That is where the main tenant is employed receiving a topup LHA.Where other family members (tenants) are also employed.Summary & Exclusions:- Rent Amount: £2,885.00 per month (£665.77 per week)- Deposit / Bond: £1,000.00- 4 Bedrooms- 1 Bathrooms- Property comes unfurnished- Available to move in from 23 September, 2023- Minimum tenancy term is 12 months- Maximum number of tenants is 5- No Students- Pets considered / by arrangement- Smokers considered- Family Friendly- Bills not included- Property has parking- Property has garden access- EPC Rating: D  If calling, please quote reference: 1821601  Fees:You will not be charged any admin fees. ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! ** Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week.

description: Property Reference: 1825580.Flat in Harrow-on-the Hill A beautiful, modern and spacious 2.5 bedroom apartment in a cozy and family-friendly lane located in the heart of Harrow-on-the-Hill. Within a 10 minute walk from the town center, Harrow-on-the-Hill station and essential shops.  Specifications:2.5 bedroom flat - with two very spacious bedrooms allowing for plenty of storage space. The master bedroom also has an ensuite bathroom. The spare bedroom has a single bunk bed and would be great for visitors or a child. The room can also function as a home office due to its inbuilt desk or a walk in dressing room due to the desk and sizeable hidden storage. Spacious, bright and airy flat with great natural light and large sliding windows.Plenty  of storage space - wardrobes and drawers in master bedroom, in-built storage in the main bathroom, hidden storage cupboards in spare bedroom/ home office.Large semi-private garden space surrounded by tall trees and accessed through secure locked side door. Both bedrooms overlook this pretty greenery.2 modern bathrooms with new fittings - one main bathroom with bath and shower as well as sanitary touch-free lighting and one well designed en-suite off the master bedroom with a shower.Fully equipped open plan kitchen - plenty of worktop space along with fan oven, microwave, fridge and freezer, cabinet storage and functional dining area with bar stools.Underfloor heating in both bathrooms as well as radiators throughout flat.Reserved off-street parking space at the front of the property. EPC - CCouncil Tax Band - C (Harrow Council) Square Footage - Approximately 790 square feet Location and travel links:Located in a safe, tranquil and family friendly neighbourhood.Travel - 5 minutes walk away from Harrow-on-the-Hill Station (20 mins to Baker Street, 27 mins to King's Cross). Great connectivity to Heathrow Airport (35 minutes by car, 60 minutes by Express Service from Harrow Bus Station)Shopping - Within a 5-10 minute walk of essential shops e.g., a Morrissons, M&S Simply Food and BP petrol station. For further shopping needs, St Ann's Shopping Centre is located a 9 minute walk away. Sights - 8 minutes walk away from St. Mary's Church (see photo) and Harrow School which are both beautiful Grade I listed areas. Lovey green spaces nearby including Grove Open Space and Churchfields (see photos).Eating and drinking - Selection of local shops, pubs and restaurants in the main street of Harrow-on-the-Hill which is within 10mins walking distance. Especially recommend 'The Castle', a heritage pub, beer garden and restaurant, which is less than a 10 minute walk away and has been a permanent fixture in Harrow-on-the Hill since 1716. Summary & Exclusions:- Rent Amount: £2,350.00 per month (£542.31 per week)- Deposit / Bond: £2,711.53- 3 Bedrooms- 2 Bathrooms- Property comes furnished- Available to move in from 22 September, 2023- Minimum tenancy term is 12 months- Maximum number of tenants is 3- No Students- Pets considered / by arrangement- No Smokers- Family Friendly- Bills not included- Property has parking- Property has garden access- EPC Rating: C  If calling, please quote reference: 1825580  Fees:You will not be charged any admin fees. ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! ** Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week.

description: Set in beautiful countryside, this attached property is afforded stunning views all around whilst only 1 mile away from Gerrards Cross village centre. This well presented family home benefits from all the modern conveniences whilst still maintaining its character, therefore offering versatile accommodation with excellent transport links.As you enter the property, the large reception hall leads to the first spacious reception room with feature fireplace and direct access to the rear garden via double patio doors. The second reception room overlooks the rear garden and offers a relaxing living space. The stylish kitchenboasts a range a of base and wall units, utilitycupboard, 4-ring gas hob with ceiling mountedfan extractor and dining area with access tothe garden. Integrated appliances include adishwasher, oven and microwave. The separatecloakroom and second bedroom with en suitebathroom complete the accommodationdownstairs.To the first floor, there are three additional well proportioned bedrooms with the master bedroom comprising an en suite shower room and separate dressing room. Bedroom four contains fitted cupboards with views of the rear garden and countryside beyond. The family bathroom has a panelled bath, low level WC and washbasin. In addition there is a 2 acre paddock.KitchenA good sized well equipped kitchen with doors opening to gardenReceptionLounge with open fire and double doors to gardenReceptionDouble aspect room off the hallway.BedroomWith en suite shower room and dressing room.BedroomSituated on the ground floor with en suite bathroomBedroomDouble bedroom on the first floorBedroomGood sized room with built in wardrobesBathroomSituated on the first floorBathroomEn suite shower room to master bedroom.BathroomEn suite bathroom to ground floor bedroomCloakroomDownstairs CloakroomGardenEnclosed by countryside and approached via a large winding driveway to the front and providing parking in the communal courtyard area. description: Property Reference: 1817614.Hello! One room available in this stunning, bright fully furnished 3 bedroom 1st floor flat, located on Orb Street, with Elephant & Castle tube station and Borough High Street within a 5-10 minutes walk. The flat has original wooden floors, and is freshly painted throughout. You would be sharing the flat with two other professional adults. Each bedroom is furnished with a twin bed, a wardrobe, a desk and a chest of drawers. The kitchen includes a microwave, fridge, freezer, washer/dryer and basic crockery. Available from 5th October 2023*Deposits held in DPS (protection scheme)Available 5th October. 6 months minimum, no maximum stay. All mod cons including modern furnishings, gas central heating, washing machine, separate bathroom and wc. Bills including fast broadband, gas and electricity included. Council tax is paid by tenant; there is no living room. Communal garden, off-street parking. The flat is a few minutes' walk away from Southbank University, LCC, Elephant & Castle, Burgess Park, and a short bus ride to the newly developed cultural corridor of Camberwell/Peckham. It is just minutes' walk from bustling Bermondsey street, where you'll find an array of bars, cafes and restaurants. It is also a stone's throw away from the Elephant & Castle regenerated area, where you'll find Gymbox, big Sainsbury's and plenty of cool places to eat on Sayer Street. You will find multiple bus routes providing easy access to all parts of central London.Tube lines (Within walking distance):  Elephant & Castle (Bakerloo, Thameslink and Northern)Borough (Northern line)London Bridge (Jubilee and Northern lines)We are looking for a professional or mature student who is clean, tidy, responsible and who will look after the flat. The living spaces benefit from wall to wall windows to maximize the natural light to create a bright enjoyable space. Make the most of vibrant Maidstone and its array of shops including Fremlin Walk and Saint Peters Wharf Retail Park which will satisfy any shopaholic. All ages can be entertained at Lockmeadow with its cinema, bowling and gym complex just to name a few. Spend the summer days strolling around Mote Park or riverside walks along the Medway River, all situated close by.Whatever the commute you are in the perfect spot for the Bus Station and both Maidstone West and East train stations. description: Stunning 2 Double bedroom apartment at the much anticipated Gateway Tower. This exclusive apartment is unique in both specification and design, featuring amazing city views, a spacious floorplan and curvaceous interiors make this amazing home that could be yours to live in.With the apartment only being a few metres away stone's throw away from Royal Victoria Station (DLR), Custom House (Crossrail & DLR), and a further few minutes away from Canning Town station (Jubilee Line, Overground & DLR) your daily commute into the City centre and beyond could not be any simpler. Located on the 6th floor, this 2 bedroom apartment is simply spacious with 922 sq ft of internal space. The apartment is superbly finished, with modern & sleek furniture complimenting the architectural handiwork that this apartment is. And to top it all off, after a hard day's work, why not sit back, relax in some deck chairs on your either of your panoramic balconies, as you admire the views beyond, looking over the Victoria Docks, River Thames, O2 Arena and the Emirates cable cars move curiously in the distance on those warm summer evenings. This 2 bedroom apartment is full of light and space, offering you loads of chilling space.A sense of safety and security is assured in the knowledge that your concierge service is there monitoring the development on a 24-hour basis; there to collect all deliveries and ensure security is constant throughout the year. Also available is secure cycle storage. Local amenities include; nearby local Tesco supermarket, numerous cafés as well as restaurants, and of course with the apartment only being a short distance from Stratford, Canary Wharf and other areas, you can indulge in all that London has to offer. description:
This spacious 3 double bedroom apartment is situated on the 5th floor of this sought-after residential building close to the open spaces of Hyde Park. The property is located within a six-minute walk to either Lancaster Gate & Paddington underground stations, which are serviced by the Central, Bakerloo, Circle, Hammersmith & City and District lines. Chiltern Railways, GWR, Heathrow Connect and Heathrow Express are also accessible from the Paddington Station.

The apartment comprises a very spacious reception room with dining space and good size living area. There's a semi-open plan fully fitted kitchen integrated with well-known appliances and good size breakfast bar, double master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling built-in wardrobes, luxury en-suite double bathroom with large raindrop shower head, second double bedroom with built-in storage space, further modern walk-in shower room with greyish stone finish and chrome fixtures & fittings, 3rd bedroom/study, guest cloakroom/WC and a large entrance hallway with built-in storage spaces. The property is offered on a furnished basis with wood floors throughout, has recently been redecorated and spans a sizeable 1185 sq ft in space internally.

The building offers a 24-hour concierge, lift access and 24-hour CCTV surveillance. The property is moments away from the open spaces of Hyde Park, while nearby areas of interest include Paddington, Bayswater and Queensway. The amenities of the West End are a short journey away. EPC-C

description: Property Reference: 1820091.Quiet West London Mews House - Short Let/All Bills IncludedHidden away in a small private mews with no passing traffic, this modern house is conveniently located near a vibrant high street, underground stations and bus routes.  Ravenscourt Park is just a ten minute walk away, making this property ideal for parents of kids attending Latymer Upper School, Godolphin & Latymer School and the West London Free School.Deceptively spacious with high ceilings, this house is equipped with premium brand kitchen appliances and bathroom fittings. key_features: ['2 Double Bedroom with Built-in Wardrobes (Lower & Ground Floors - 902 Sq Ft)', 'Luxury Bathroom with Light Grey Porcelain Finish x 1 & Guest/WC Cloakroom x 1', 'Large Reception Room with Breakfast Bar and Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'Contemporary Separate Fully Fitted Eat-in Kitchen with Well-Known Appliances', 'Furnished / EPC-B / Air Ventilation System / Digital Heating Thermostat', 'Under Floor Heating / Separate Large Utility Room / LED Spotlighting', 'Water-Fountain Courtyard / Communal Roof Gardens / Bike Store / Parcel Room', 'Beautiful Concierge & Security / 2 x Sizable Private Patio (55 & 68 Sq Ft)', 'Moment from Camden Road Overground Station & Camden Town Underground Station']
description:
This very stylish 2 double-bedroom duplex apartment is situated right in the heart of the funky & trendy Camden Town. This top-specification residential building named - Camden Courtyards allows you to be perfectly placed to enjoy everything this fantastic location has to offer. Architecture inspired by local Victorian and Georgian, designed with the area's industrial heritage in mind, featuring elongated windows, high ceilings, weathered steel and the ingenious S-shaped building is wrapped around a tranquil courtyard. The property enjoys easy access to a number of transport stations, with 2 minutes walk to Camden Road Overground Station and 7 to 8 minutes walk to Camden Town Underground Station (Northern Line). There are also plenty of local buses available (29,46,134,214,253,274, C2, N20, N29, N253 & N279) along Camden Road.

Set on the lower & ground floors, this impeccable apartment is offered on either a furnished basis and has been stylishly decorated throughout. It comprises of a large double reception room with dining space and sizable floor-to-ceiling courtyard-faced windows affording lots of natural daylight into the property. There's a separate fully fitted modern stone worktop kitchen integrated with built-in well-known appliances, master bedroom with built-in storage spaces, light grey porcelain finish double family bathroom blended with dark wood fittings and silver chrome fixtures, second double bedroom with built-in wardrobes, guest cloakroom/WC, unusual large utility room with plenty of storage space, spacious hallway and 2 x good size private balcony (65 Sq Ft) with direct access from the master room & 2nd bedroom providing a relaxing retreat in this vibrant and eclectic area.

The property further benefits include large and double-glazed windows, multi-channel underfloor heating, air ventilation system, digital heating thermostats, LED spotlighting, hardwood floors in the reception & hallway and luxury comfort carpet in the bedrooms. The residents also freely enjoy from a beautiful concierge, CCTV, security, sizable lift access, residents' water-fountain courtyard, very stylish, modern & breezy communal roof gardens, bike store and parcel room.

The property is located in one of the most enviable locations in London, Camden Town is internationally renowned as one of the most dynamic places in the UK. Famed for its alternative fashion, acclaimed music scene and the well-known Camden Market just a ten-minute walk from your door. The High Street offers a wealth of convenience stores, shops, cafés, local bars and restaurants. Camden Town is also home to a large, diverse residential community and a thriving business environment. The largest Salisbury in town is only 5 minute away on foot. EPC-B

The living spaces benefit from wall to wall windows to maximize the natural light to create a bright enjoyable space. Make the most of vibrant Maidstone and its array of shops including Fremlin Walk and Saint Peters Wharf Retail Park which will satisfy any shopaholic. All ages can be entertained at Lockmeadow with its cinema, bowling and gym complex just to name a few. Spend the summer days strolling around Mote Park or riverside walks along the Medway River, all situated close by.Whatever the commute you are in the perfect spot for the Bus Station and both Maidstone West and East train stations. description: Regent are delighted to present this brand new, beautiful three-bedroom apartment, which is a part of the Silk District development in a highly desirable location. The elegantly designed property which is rising elegantly in the city's skyline comprises three double bedrooms, two modern fully equipped bathrooms, an open kitchen with a stylishly attached dining area, and a magnificent living room with a stunning balcony to experience the elegant skyline.Alongside, The Georgette Apartments enjoys an array of landscaped and rooftop gardens, green open spaces with health-friendly amenities. The whole development has a centralized security office/dedicated concierge, CCTV security, and video entry panel located near the door. The green open spaces and their distinctive architecture make the apartment appealing and serene. Regent Property comply with the Tenant Fees Act 2019 and are members of The Property Ombudsman scheme. Our Client Money Protection is provided by the UKALA Total Loss CMP scheme. For more information please visit our website or call our office on the number above.

description: Located in the ideal spot to get around the City, the evolving area around Royal Gateway is a fantastic opportunity to be amongst some the city's most luxurious apartments, as well as a hop away from some of the best connected stations in London.Designed with the seasons in mind, the influx of light keeps this stylishly simple and immaculately clean studio apartment pleasantly warm all year round. With an open plan kitchen that pairs the lounge, residents will be able to entertain their friends; whilst cooking up that dish you have been meaning to try for a while. The excellently furnished apartment give a cosy feel with a pristine bathroom perfect for refreshment before bed or the long day aheadSituated a stone's throw away from Canning Town, which leaves residents with London's sights at their disposal; an easy enough commute to anywhere in the City. So does it sound like it is the right property for you? If so, please call the East London Lettings team on Tel: +44 (0) 20 7 476 0125 and we will happily arrange a viewing for you.

description: Welcome to your amazing new home in the iconic Royal Wharf development, a stunning new town been developed by Ballymore Homes on the banks of the River Thames in E16. Spanning 555 Sq Ft this amazing fully furnished one bedroom apartment is located in the newly released John Cabot House on the South side of the development.In addition, your new home will also provide you with an 87 sqft  private balcony with direct access from your Living Room and bedroom. You will love the amount of brightness this apartment has to offer with its floor to ceiling windows throughout with open views over the River Thames and plenty of afternoon sun to enjoy. Here in Royal Wharf you will have access to your 24 Hour Concierge Service and have the use of the 25,000 Sq. Ft Clubhouse and Leisure facilities including Gym, Swimming Pool, Sauna, Steam Room and Jacuzzi. Amenities such as Starbucks, Sainsbury's, Pharmacy, Dental Practice, School, Crèche, Little Hudson Cafe, 222 Coffee, Nail Bar and The Windjammer are now open on site with many more to follow including NHS Clinic, Bars, Cafes and Restaurants.Your commute to work shall also be stress free. London Bus shall have their own service running through Royal Wharf or you can easily walk to Pontoon Dock/ Westsilver Town DLR or alternatively you use the luxury of Water Travel via Royal Wharfs very own Clipper Service. 'Maximum Occupancy Applies'

description: **NEWLY REDECORATED THROUGHOUT** Homelink are delighted to be the landlords chosen sole agent in to the rental market this beautifully presented first floor 3 double bedroom apartment set in a period building in Southgate.The property benefits from having spacious rooms throughout along with 2 new separate bathrooms. Outside there are beautifully maintained gardens front and back which are accessed directly via a door in the kitchen. The property is being offered to families only.Bramford Court is located on High Street, Southgate and offers owners the best of all worlds in terms of location. Southgate's station, library, and leisure centre, plus the shops and amenities of Chase Side and Southgate Green are all located within 0.5 miles of the property. Local roads also give excellent access to the North London road network for commuters. Grovelands Park and Southgate Cricket Ground are also nearby.To arrange a viewing, call and speak to one of friendly lettings team. Viewing highly recommended.BrochuresBramford Court, High St., Southgate, N14Brochure

description: Applicant Requirements:We are searching for tenant(s) with a minimum household income of £46,500pa+.-Baker and Chase are delighted to present this unique, recently-converted split level 2 bedroom ground and first floor flat, second bedroom is on the first floor and could be suitable for a number of different uses such as a guest bedroom, home office/study area, storage room or a dressing area. This lovely property is located in one of Enfield's most picturesque and desirable locations. The accommodation consists of a double bedroom. generous living space, with access to a lovely modern fully fitted kitchen with a range of integrated appliances, including a fridge freezer, dishwasher and washer/dryer. There is an additional utility/storage space which leads to a stylish, modern well equipped bathroom with a bath and shower. The smaller second bedroom is on the first floor with views over the river. The property would suit a commuter or someone who works locally as there are no parking provisions at the property, however, the property is excellently situated to provide access to Enfield Town, Chase Side and Windmill Hill, which has a wide range of shops, restaurants and transport links.For more information, or to arrange a viewing, please call our office.Living Room - Frosted glazed wooden front door leading to open plan lounge area with coir matting on entrance, laminate flooring, ceiling spotlights, 2 radiators, wooden framed double glazed window to front, wooden shutters, door to storage cupboard.Kitchen - Laminate flooring, ceiling spotlights, wooden framed double glazed sash window to front, blind, range of wooden wall and base units with marble granite worktops, integrated Lamona fridge freezer, built in Lamona electric oven and hob, stainless steel cooker hood and extractor over, integrated Lamona washer dryer, integrated Lamona dishwasher, inset stainless steel sink unit with mixer taps, cupboard housing Ideal combi boiler, under unit lighting.Storage/Utility Room - Laminate flooring, ceiling spotlights, wall mounted feature radiator, storage cupboard housing consumer unit and electric meter.Bathroom - Marble tiled flooring, fuly tiled marble walls, ceiling spotlights, ceiling extractor fan, wall mounted chrome heated towel rail, low flush wc, wall mounted wash hand basin with drawer under, P shaped panel enclosed bath with mixer tap, wall mounted shower attachment with glass shower screen.Bedroom 1 - Fitted carpets, radiator, ceiling spotlights, wooden framed double glazed window to front, wooden shutters.Bedroom 2/Study Area - Door leading to stairs to first floor with fitted carpets, Bedroom 2/home office/study area Fitted carpets, ceiling spotlights, wooden framed double glazed window to side overlooking River View, glass balustrade.Disclaimer - Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations 2008: The Agent has not tested any apparatus, equipment, fixtures and fittings or services and so cannot verify that they are in working order or fit for the purpose. References to the Tenure of a Property are based on information supplied by our client. The Agent has not had sight of the title documents. Items shown in photographs are NOT necessarily included. Consent to Rent: By approving our property particulars/advertising, our client(s) confirm they have obtained all permissions to rent the property. Measurements: These approximate room sizes are only intended as general guidance. You must verify the dimensions carefully before ordering carpets or any furniture.Services: Please note we have not tested the services or any of the equipment or appliances in this property, accordingly we strongly advise prospective occupiers to commission their own survey or service reports before finalising their offer.Copyright: You may download, store and use the material for your own personal use and research. You may not republish, retransmit, redistribute or otherwise make the material available to any party or make the same available on any website, online service or bulletin board of your own or of any other party or make the same available in hard copy or in any other media without the website owner's express prior written consent. The website owner's copyright must remain on all reproductions of material taken from this website.Anti-Money Laundering Regulations: Intending parties will be asked to produce identification documentation at offer stage and we would ask for your co-operation in order that there will be no delay in agreeing the sale/rental.Availability: Interested parties must check the availability of any property and make an appointment to view before embarking on any journey to see a property.Fixtures: Items shown in photographs are NOT included. A list of the furnishings can be requested separately.  Referencing: Preferred applicants for a property will be expected to provide financial, credit and employment information, personal/professional references and potentially a guarantor for referencing purposes.BrochuresChase Side Place, Enfield Chase

description:
HCGB are delighted to present Brent House a developed gated community comprising of stylish 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with balconies. 

Brent House offers a unique living experience in the heart of Wembley, with the benefit of a Concierge, Communal court yard, Roof top gardens and Children's playground.

*	Bright and spacious interiors
*	Available furnished or unfurnished
*	Modern & stylish kitchen with appliances
*	Full length windows
*	Private balcony terrace area
*	Great links to amenities such as Wembley Arena, shopping park, restaurants 
*	Excellent transport links, Wembley Central London Underground and Overground Station (Zone 4 - Bakerloo Line and National Rail) is situated 650 metres to the west and provides access to Oxford Circus in 30 minutes and Wembley Stadium Overground Station (Travel Zone 4 - National Rail) is situated 300 metres to the north east of the Property, providing access to London Marylebone in 13 minutes.

description:
A modern, two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment to rent on Queenstown Road. 

Large 920 sqft, consisting of two large bedrooms with plenty of wardrobe space, ensuite bathrooms plus a spacious open plan living/kitchen area with a generous private balcony. 


Situated 5 minutes from Battersea Park, close to central London, and only minutes away from Chelsea/Nine Elms. It is also a stone's throw from Battersea Power Station. 

Battersea Park is renowned for its timeless beauty, green open spaces, and leisure activities; this prestigious development combines this beauty with great design, befitting of its position and surroundings.

The transport links are excellent, with overground and underground access within a ten-minute walk, with the new Northern Line extension at Battersea Power Station open, which enables a commute time to the City in less than 15 minutes.

description:
EC Residential is delighted to introduce this bright and spacious renovated studio apartment, with bills included, available now in Prince`s Square.

The apartment is fully furnished and comes with all bills included. The property is minutes away from Hyde Park, Notting Hill Station and Portobello Road. Located on a quiet street and near the vast selection of local amenities, the property is located close to a number of transport links including Lancaster Gate, Queensway, Paddington, Royal Oak and Bayswater Tube stations, and within walking distance from Kensington Garden. The property comes fully furnished with designer furniture. Princes Square is a leafy residential street located in Bayswater, W2.

description: A fantastic recently redecorated and refurbished four bedroom detached bungalow located in a desirable location within Tiptree. The property offers spacious versatile accommodation with a brand new kitchen and bathroom.  Externally the property offers a spacious garden, detached garage and off street parking for several vehicles. The property is available now and comes unfurnished.Entrance Hallway - 9.56 x 0.90 (31'4" x 2'11") - With storage cupboard. Doors leading to:Kitchen - 4.28 x 3.29 (14'0" x 10'9") - A brand new fitted kitchen with stainless steel sink and drainer with mixer tap over inset into a rolled edge worksurface with a range of cupboards and drawers under. Matching range of eye level wall mounted units. Inset four ring electric hob with extractor hood over. Single electric oven under. Space for fridge/freezer. Plumbing for washing machine. French Doors opening into the rear garden.Lounge/Diner - 4.00 x 5.21 (13'1" x 17'1") - A good sized light room with doors to:Conservatory - 2.74 x 3.90 (8'11" x 12'9") - With doors to garden.Bedroom One - 3.71 x 4.21 (12'2" x 13'9") - A double bedroom with window to front aspect. Door to:Ensuite - 2.02 x 1.22 (6'7" x 4'0") - Fitted with a shower cubicle and electric shower, low level WC and vanity wash hand basin with storage cupboard under. Window to side aspect.Bedroom Two - 4.17 x 3.30 (13'8" x 10'9") - A double bedroom with box bay window to front aspect.Bedroom Three - 3.14 x 4.21 (10'3" x 13'9") - A double bedroom with window to side aspect.Bedroom Four - 1.76 x 3.32 (5'9" x 10'10") - With window to side aspect.Bathroom - 2.34 x 3.43 (7'8" x 11'3") - A brand new white suite with panel bath, low level WC and pedestal wash hand basin. Window to side aspect.Outside - To the front of the property is off street parking for several vehicles, enclosed by a low level brick wall with access to the side of the property and garage. The rear garden commences with an area of patio and opening into a good sized lawn garden with numerous mature plants, trees and shrubs. Garden is all enclosed by panel fencing.Relevant Letting Fees - As well as paying the rent, you may also be required to make the following permitted payments.Permitted payments:Before the tenancy starts (payable to Matthew James Property Consultants, "the Agent")Holding Deposit: 1 weeks' rentDeposit: 5 weeks' rentDuring the tenancy (payable to the Agent):Payment of £50 for the variation, assignment or novation of the tenancy (capped at £50 or reasonable costs)Payment of interest for the late payment of rent at a rate of 3% above the base rate of the Bank of England.Payment up to £100.00 for the reasonably incurred costs for the loss of keys/security devices.Payment of any unpaid rent or other reasonable costs associated with your early termination of the tenancy.Tenancy Information - The rent is exclusive of utilities and council tax.Minimum term: 12 MonthsDeposit: £1,961.00Council Tax Band: CAvailability: NOWEPC Rating: C - 72No PetsNon SmokersMJPC is a member of propertymark which is a client money protection scheme, and also a member of The Property Ombudsman, which is a redress scheme. You can find out more details on the agent's website or by contacting the agent directlyViewings - Strictly by prior appointment with the Letting Agent.BrochuresSeldon Road, Tiptree, ColchesterBrochure

description: Property Reference: 1733163.A two bedroom mid terraced property is available to rent on the 7th August with the exception of the Reception Area which is used for storage.The property is located on a quiet, residential street and is just a five minute walk away from the bus stop and 10 mins bus ride to the mainline train station. It also has a few corner shops within a five minute walk away.20 minutes to Underground Tube Station5 minute walk to the bus stop and approx 10 minutes bus ride to the Overground station dependent on traffic10 minutes from local shops and amenitiesThe property makes for the perfect home for a couple or friends sharing. Two double bedrooms are located on the first floor of the property, with wardrobes / chest of drawers, divans available, mattresses not included.The kitchen on the ground floor has ample storage / cupboard space and recently fitted extractor fan. The fridge/freezer is located in the hallway adjacent to the kitchen and the washing machine and boiler are located in the boiler room in the garden.Modern touches like double glazing have recently been fitted throughout the property. The garden has a patio area with an artificial lawn for easy maintenance, and includes patio table and chairs set and a BBQ. Outside there is parking available with allocated permits available for purchase directly from the council.Main featuresTwo double bedroomsOne bathroomGarden and parkingBedrooms have fitted wardrobes/cupboards and Divans without mattresses Fridge Freezer included no appliances provided in kitchenBills InclusiveClose to public transport and amenitiesFibre Optic Broadband availableRent is £850 per room inccluding bills.References will be required, along with a security deposit equivalent to one month’s rent.Summary & Exclusions:- Rent Amount: £750.00 per month (£173.08 per week)- Deposit / Bond: £750.00- 2 Bedrooms- 1 Bathrooms- Property comes unfurnished- Available to move in from 07 September, 2023- Minimum tenancy term is 12 months- Maximum number of tenants is 4- No Students- No Pets, sorry- No Smokers- Family Friendly- Bills Included- Property has parking- Property has garden access- EPC Rating: EPC Not Required (Shared Accommodation)  If calling, please quote reference: 1733163  Fees:You will not be charged any admin fees. ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! ** Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week.

This exquisite brand-new rental property features one lavish bedroom and an elegant bathroom, offering a seamless fusion of contemporary sophistication and luxurious living. Encompassing approximately 550 square feet, this upscale residence showcases a meticulously crafted layout that optimizes both space and comfort.Step into this modern haven adorned with pristine furnishings that effortlessly complement the sleek finishes throughout. The open-plan kitchen beckons culinary ingenuity, while the generously proportioned double bedrooms provide a tranquil retreat for relaxation.Indulge in the vibrant cityscape from your very own window, where you can unwind and immerse yourself in the bustling energy of London's dynamic ambiance. Nestled in the heart of the coveted Tottenham Court Road area, you are mere moments away from various transportation hubs, including the bustling epicenter of Tottenham Court Road station itself. description: The Property: Delightful newly refurbished Grade 11 Listed three bedroom character cottage, located close to Redbourn Common. Available now.Description: This fabulous character home has been lovingly refurbished whilst retaining the property's character features. The front door opens into a large dining area with wood flooring which opens into a newly fitted kitchen with stylish units and integrated appliances. There is a large dual aspect living room with a fabulous inglenook fireplace with log burning copper stove and French doors out to the garden.  First floor accommodation comprises a large landing giving access to two generous bedrooms, one with character brick fireplace, both serviced by a newly fitted family bathroom.  On the second floor is a further large bedroom with attractive wood beams and wood floor.  There is a 70' rear garden and patio. A large timber outbuilding sits to one side of the lawn and a gate to the side of the property giving access to the front.  The property has USB points in all rooms.Council Tax Band E with St AlbansEPC rating exempt Grade IILocation: Church End is one of the prime roads in Redbourn just off the Common.  The village's extensive amenities are all within a short walk and include a range of amenities from Co-op to independent shops.  The village has an excellent primary school.  More extensive shopping and leisure facilities are a short drive away in both Harpenden and the historic city of St Albans which both offer a fast rail link into London St Pancras. Junction 9 of the M1 and London Luton Airport are also nearby.BrochuresWeb Details

description: Princess Beatrice HouseOpened by Queen Victoria's youngest daughter in 1930, Princess Beatrice House's reign over the Old Brompton Road is still as elegant on the outside as it's always been.  However, the interior of this historical building has now been transformed into a stunning selection of one bedroom and studio spaces. State of the art security doors have replaced the main entrance Princess Beatrice would have stepped through and inside a daily estate management team is always present. Slick, cool communal parts and a 'talking' lift will take you to all 5 floors of the building, where you will find a diverse range of bright, super spec and totally unique apartments. The top floors have breath taking views across London's landscape where you'll be able to say goodnight to the London Eye or the Shard before bedtime. Located less than a 4 minute walk away from Earls Court Underground and just moments away from a multitude of shops, bars and restaurants the building is perfectly situated for any type of tenant. The following utility bills are charged at an additional £30 pw: Council Tax, Electric, Heating & Hot Water and WIFI.tlc Estate Agents are an ARLA registered agent with Client Money Protection and Members of The Property Ombudsman.Please contact the lettings team at tlc for further details.

description: This beautiful home features an open plan living space, one bedrooms, one bathrooms, and sensational south facing views across Essex Court.The open plan reception room benefits from high ceilings, and is doused in an abundance of natural light from the stunning sash windows, offering delightful, calming views across Essex Court, a historic cobbled square showcasing beautiful architecture with established trees to the centre.The kitchen is contemporary in design, benefiting from top of the range Siemens integrated appliances and Cararra marble splashbacks. The apartment boasts a master bedroom finished with luxury carpet that flows throughout the space, with the addition of bespoke fitted wardrobes, creating a contemporary yet cosy feel. The bathroom is elegantly finished with floor to ceiling marble tiles and underfloor heating for that added layer of luxury. Strand Chambers is a boutique development of just nine apartments located at this world famous address opposite the architecturally appealing Royal Courts of Justice.The perfectly positioned apartments allow easy access to the Capital’s main business district, world class educational institutions and the cultural hub of Covent Garden, with Temple (0.2 miles), Holborn (0.5 miles) and Blackfriars (0.5 miles) Underground Stations moments away. Surrounding this spectacular development are some of the Capital’s best boutique shops, green spaces and leisure and culture facilities. Only minutes away from the famous Covent Garden Piazza (0.4 miles), and a short walk from Lincoln’s Inn Fields (0.4 miles), this historic address is synonymous with the best London has to offer.There is a requirement of a 5 week (rent equivalent under £50,000 per annum) deposit for new and renewed tenancies (or 6 weeks if the annual rent is £50,000 or more).For more information about our fees please visit our web-site’s ‘Tenant Fees’ page located under the Rent tab. description:
NEWLY DECORATED ONE BEDROOM LOWER GROUND FLOOR PURPOSE BUILT FLAT WITH UNDERGROUND PARKING SPACEWhen it comes to shops, bars and restaurants the hubbub of Church Road, George Street and Blatchington Road all offer plenty of choice surrounded by iconic period architecture. Hove Lawns, Palmeira Square and Adelaide Crescent offer plenty of green open spaces to relax in, while the beach and seafront is never far away. For cricket fans the County ground is found on Eaton Road.Hove mainline station provides convenient commuter links to London and Gatwick, and regular bus services travel all across the city and up to Devil’s Dyke.AVAILABLE 14TH OCTOBER COUNCIL TAX BAND A - £1303 UNFURNISHEDNO PETS ALLOWED
TENANT INFORMATIONRight to Rent - Sawyer & Co cannot start processing an application until the Right to Rent check has been completed (passport min’ requirement). Client Money Protection - Sawyer & Co are part of a client money protection scheme. Our Client Money Protection (CMP) Scheme is a compensation scheme run by the National Federation of Property Professionals (NFoPP) which provides compensation to landlords, tenants and other clients should an agent misappropriate their rent, deposit or other client funds.Independent Redress Provided by The Property Ombudsman - Sawyer & Co are part of The Property Ombudsman Scheme (TPOS). This scheme has been providing consumers and property agents with an alternative dispute resolution service since 1990.The Ombudsman’s resolutions are designed to achieve a full and final settlement of the dispute and all claims made by either party. The Ombudsman can, where appropriate, make compensatory awards in individual cases up to a maximum of £25,000 for actual and quantifiable loss and/or for aggravation, distress and/or inconvenience caused by the actions of an agent

description: A very well presented TWO BEDROOM house benefiting from modern open plan layout to ground floor, lounge, cloakroom, shaker style fitted kitchen, under floor heating and wood effect flooring. A double and single bedroom to first floor, modern shower room with vanity unit, WC, shower cubicle and chrome heated towel rail. Externally off road parking for two vehicles to front aspect and path leading to the the rear courtyard area.  Located in the village of Westoning close to M1 junction 12 and a short drive to Flitwick & Harlington train stations. **Available 9th October onwards**EPC Band - CAgents Note - A holding deposit equivalent to 1 week’s rent is required to reserve the property. Upon completion of satisfactory credit referencing full payment of the first month’s rent is required (less the holding deposit if being used as part payment of the rent) plus the tenancy deposit, equivalent to 5 weeks rent. Monthly rent will be payable per calendar month in advance. Please see website for full tenancy information.

description: Located in Mile End Park and on the banks of the Regents Canal is this stylish modern apartment that forms part of the contemporary Candy Wharf development. The property is situated on the top floor and has had new Karndean flooring installed along with new carpets in the bedroom. Comprising a double bedroom, secure underground parking, bathroom, and a superb open plan reception/kitchen with floor-to-ceiling glass doors leading to a full-width balcony, boasting views towards the iconic Canary Wharf skyline and peaceful Mile End Park. The apartment also has use of the wonderful roof gardens, offering 360-degree views of the London skyline. Well connected for transport links into the City and Canary Wharf from Mile End Station. Victoria Park is also close by. Council Tax Band C.

The property is situated on Goldsmith Row with excellent access to the Vibrant Broadway Market that offers and array of shops and dining experiences. You will also be placed between the Beautiful Open Spaces of Haggerston Park and London Fields and with the Regents Canal at the end of the Road a short Scenic Walk will find you enjoying the Relaxed, Cool Feel of Victoria Park and the weekly Farmers Market will make for wonderful lazy Sunday morning strolls. This property really is set within the Heart of the East End with easy access to all of the Restaurants, Bars, Shops, Markets, Gyms, Parks, Galleries and Museums this Exciting Area has on offer.Transport wise, you are within easy reach of multiple bus routes into the City, West End and beyond and both Bethnal Green Tube and Cambridge Heath Overground Stations are within walking distance. Internally the property has a spacious open plan receptions room/kitchen, two good size bedrooms and bathroom.  The property also benefits from a terrace.The property is available 07 October 2023 and Early viewing is Highly Recommended to Avoid Disappointment.Reception/Kitchen Area - 5.40 x 4.80 (17'8" x 15'8") - Bedroom One - 3.80 x 2.55 (12'5" x 8'4") - Bedroom Two - 4.20 x 2.00 (13'9" x 6'6") - Bathroom - Terrace - Material Information - Deposit: £2,653.84Length Of Tenancy: One Year Council Tax Band: CBrochuresGoldsmiths Row, LondonBrochure

description: The Personal Agent are delighted to present to the market this two double bedroom terraced house situated in a quiet location in the Tadworth area close to local schools and Epsom Downs Racecourse. This wonderful home has been modernised and maintained excellently. On the ground floor, you have the entrance hallway with downstairs w/c to the left, as well as a modern kitchen. At the rear of the property is the generously sized lounge / dining area, with doors leading directly onto the sunny conservatory, which in turn has doors onto the garden. Upstairs there are two double bedrooms, including the master with built in wardrobe, and finally the family bathroom. Further benefits to note include an allocated parking space and garage.  The nearby Epsom Downs is best known for its racecourse and surrounding open countryside, ideal for walking the dog or going for a leisurely walk, well served by local pubs and restaurants. Tadworth is ideally situated for transport links to surrounding towns, such as Banstead, Epsom, Ewell & Sutton, as well as the M25 which in turn provides access to Heathrow & Gatwick airports. The area is also well served by railway networks from Tadworth and Tattenham Corner Station, into London Victoria and London Bridge, and the local bus routes include Sutton, Banstead, Epsom, Redhill & Reigate. There are a number of excellent local schooling options, in both private & state sectors and Epsom Town centre offers a range of shopping and recreational facilities.NoticeAll photographs are provided for guidance only.

description: This two bedroom apartment is located on Crawford Street, a few moments from Baker Street.The apartment has been refurbished and stylishly designed to an excellent standard. There are two good sized double bedrooms both with en-suite bathrooms. There is a separate dining and office area adjacent to the living room and the kitchen is fully integrated.In this part of Marylebone there is a real sense of community,with a thriving array of local independent businesses. It really does have a 'village’. The Grazing Goat and Duke of Wellington are go-to spots for locals on a Sunday. At the bottom of Seymour Place you are spoilt for choice with fine dining options including Donostia, Bernadi’s. Boxcar Deli on Crawford Street serves up the best coffee in the area. The cinnamon buns are pretty good too. Marylebone High Street, Regents Park, and Hyde Park are all within walking distance. Both Baker Street and Marylebone stations are close by, making commuting around the city easy. Available September 14th.EPC Rating: C

description:
6TH FLOOR - Fully-furnished apartment located in Neroli House, with floor to ceiling windows and a luxrious finish. It is ideally located within walking distance to the City and only a short walk from the Tower of London and Tower Bridge.
This fully-furnished apartment is located in Neroli House, finished in a high specification with wooden flooring and floor to ceiling windows. It offers an open plan reception room, a fitted kitchen features a full range of integrated appliances including an oven, 4 ring hob with extractor fan hood, dishwasher, fridge freezer and wine fridge. It also has a large sleeping area and a luxury bathroom. The residents will also benefit from gymnasium, swimming pool and 5-star healthcare center, private cinema room, business lounge and 24-hour concierge.The development is a new urban quarter on the doorstep of London's financial hub and within a short stroll to the River Thames. Shoreditch and Spitalfields are also nearby which offer excellent shopping, dining, and nightlife. It is ideally located in the Aldgate regeneration area within walking distance to the City and only a short walk from the Tower of London and Tower Bridge.Local transports include Aldgate station (Circle and Metropolitan & City Lines), Aldgate East (District and Hammersmith & City Lines), Tower Gateway (DLR), Tower Hill (District and Circle Lines) and Fenchurch Street station (overground).
