description: A three double bedroom top floor Victorian conversion on Thurlow Park Road. The property has been well presented throughout and benefits from having a balcony. The property is situated in an ideal location for West Dulwich & Tulse Hill train stations. Viewings are highly recommended!Lambeth Council Tax Band D £1761.90paSafeguarding Your InformationImportant information regarding cybercrime. It has come to our attention that computer hackers are seeking to target property transactions to access funds. As we understand it, they will either hack a phone, tablet, or PC, maybe by sending out a random email that mistakenly gets opened, or even whilst opening a website, which gives them access to that machine. The reason for us mentioning this to you is to alert you that once they have gained access, they can monitor email correspondence, without you knowing, throughout a transaction. Then, at a relevant point, e.g. just before the exchange of contracts, they can send an email to a client mirroring that of their solicitor asking for funds to be transferred to a certain bank account. That money then, of course, disappears. Fortunately, we have not had such an instance but, feel it important to highlight the fact that if you do receive an email requesting funds, it is worth checking with the person concerned by phone that it is genuine and the bank details are correct, before sending money. This could, of course, affect other areas of finance beyond the property. Solicitors are starting to highlight this point now, but for safety, we would urge you to be vigilant and check before sending money or passing on any personal details regarding any bank or credit card information.The Property Misdescriptions Act 1991These particulars are set out as a general outline in accordance with the Property Misdescriptions Act (1991) only for the guidance of intending purchasers or lessees and do not constitute any part of an offer or contract. Details are given without any responsibility, and any intending purchasers, lessees or third parties should not rely on them as statements or representations of fact but must satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise as to the correctness of each of them. We have not carried out a structural survey and the services, appliances and specific fittings have not been tested. All photographs, measurements, floor plans, and distances referred to are given as a guide only and should not be relied upon for the purchase of carpets or any other fixtures or fittings. Gardens, roof terraces, balconies as well as tenure and lease details cannot have their accuracy guaranteed for intending purchasers. Lease details, service charge, ground rent are given as a guide only and should be checked and confirmed by your solicitor. No person in the employment of Galloways has any authority to make any representation or warranty in relation to this property. Purchase prices, rents, or other prices quoted are correct at the date of publication and, unless otherwise stated, exclusive of VAT.Data ProtectionWe retain the copyright in all advertising material used to market this Property.Disclosure of Referral FeesAs well as your obligation to pay Galloway's commission or fees where applicable we may also receive a commission, payment, fee, or other reward or other benefits (known as a Referral Fee) from ancillary service providers for recommending their service to you. We believe you may benefit from using the services of our solicitors, independent financial advisors and surveyors, the Providers, who are known as Lewis Nedas Law, Bargate Murray Solicitors, Hawke Financial Services and MAP Surveyors. Galloways always refer sellers and purchasers to Lewis Nedas Law, Bargate Murray Solicitors. It is your decision whether you choose to deal with the named companies. Should you decide to use Lewis Nedas Law, Bargate Murray Solicitors, you should know that we would receive a referral fee of £180.00 inc VAT from them for recommending you to them. Galloways routinely refer to all potential purchasers and vendors to Hawke Financial Services. It is your decision whether you choose to deal with Hawke Financial Services. In making that decision, you should know that we receive benefits from Hawke Financial Services. The amount depends on the property value and level of mortgage. A share of this fee is received by Galloways, the details of which are available upon request.Galloways offer all of our customers the opportunity to use the services of MAP surveyors. It is your decision whether you choose to deal with MAP surveyors. You should know that Galloways receive a referral fee of £50.00 inc VAT from MAP Surveyors for recommending you to them. You are not under any obligation to use the services of any of the recommended providers, though should you accept our recommendation the provider is expected to pay us the corresponding Referral Fee. The Referral fee is separate from your obligation to pay our own fees or commission.BrochuresThurlow Park Road, Dulwich, SE21Brochure

description: OVERVIEW  The house is spread over basement, ground, first and second floors. The basement level is home to the garage which could double up as extra storage if required. As you walk into the home on the ground floor, you step into a hallway entrance with a downstairs WC and the open plan kitchen/diner. You will notice the beautiful Oak Clay Grey Herringbone engineered flooring throughout the ground floor accommodation. The room itself is flooded with light via the double doors opening out to your private rear garden, a perfect addition to your entertaining space or somewhere the kids can play out in. The Shaker style kitchens by Benchmarx have been designed in Marlow Stone Grey, paired with Carrara Quartz worktops and splashbacks. A range of well-respected Bosch integrated appliances have been added to include an angled glass cooker hood, gas hob, fridge/freezer and dishwasher. On your way upstairs to the first floor there is a split landing taking you to the living room, the bedrooms and bathrooms are then spread over first and second floors. Four bedrooms each benefit from built in storage and bedrooms 1, 2 and 3 all have private en-suite shower rooms. The added study is an ideal work from home space and the utility room with a built-in washer/dryer saves you walking up and down the stairs! The bathrooms and en-suites are all in contemporary white sanitaryware with Porcelanosa wall and floor tiles. Whether you are looking to relax in your Fairford Dunsford bath or jump into the shower you will enjoy pampering yourself in your elegant new space.Designed and built by Mera Real Estate. With a background of 15 years in property development and construction, we can confidently say that they always deliver exceptional quality homes throughout London and the Home Counties. Their impeccable track record has grown their business and become one of the fastest-growing property developers in the South East. Mera Real Estate is fully committed to ensuring that their builds have a positive and rippling impact on the local communities and their surroundings. Throughout each step of the development process, they like to make sure that they are always mindful of how their decisions will impact the immediate and wider environment. They aim to incorporate sustainable eco-friendly features within their planning, design, and construction phases.EPC Rating: BCouncil tax band: tbc LOCATION  If you are looking for a lovely Surrey country village feel but with all the conveniences of a London Borough, Kenley arguably has it all. Located around some beautiful countryside, and yet only a 40 minute commute into Central London via Kenley Train Station, as well as being only 4 miles from the M25. Kenley's high street has a selection of local shops, amenities and eateries, Saffron Indian Restaurant is a favourite amongst local residents. For a more extensive range of facilities, leisure activities, shops and restaurants, Purley is just 2 miles away. DISCLAIMER   This information is intended as a guide only and must not be relied upon as a statement of fact. This does not form the basis of a contract of any part thereof. The descriptions, distances and other information are believed to be correct but their accuracy is not guaranteed. Any intending tenant must therefore satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise as to their correctness. We reserve the right to alter the specification without notice and substitute materials, equipment or fittings for similar quality.

description: This absolutely stunning and spacious new development two bedroom apartment is finished to the highest standard and offers a contemporary living space. Comprising a spacious hallway with wood floors as you enter the property, there is a large eat-in kitchen with integrated appliances and spacious reception room which leads out to a huge private decked balcony. There are two large and equally sized double bedrooms, a contemporary tiled bathroom and a huge storage room. The property also benefits from one private off street parking space.Limerick Close is a brand new development located on Atkins Road. Just a few moments walk away you will find Clapham South underground station (Northern Line, zone two) providing easy access to the City and West End. There are plentiful amenities surrounding Clapham South, including cafés such as The Common Room and a choice of supermarkets. The ever popular Abbeville Village is also nearby offering a selection of restaurants, bars and boutique shops. The green open spaces of Clapham Common are also within a short walk, as is the heart of Balham offering a wider variety of cafés, eateries and shops.

The development boasts fantastic amenities,  such as 24 hr conceirge, residents only gym and treatment center. The developemtn itself is also at an excellent location as it is right  in the heart of Shoreditch.
16TH FLOOR - One bedroom apartment of the sought after Makers development.The apartment comprises an open plan reception/kitchen with floor-to-ceiling picture windows and access to the winter garden. The area offers many clubs, pubs, restaurants, fitness and leisure centers.

description: This incredibly spacious one-bedroom ground floor apartment is nestled in the desirable centre of Clerkenwell. This modern development offers a comfortable and contemporary living experience, perfectly suited for individuals or couples seeking a stylish urban retreat. Upon entering the apartment, you will be greeted by a light-filled open-plan kitchen and living space. The seamless integration of these areas creates a wonderful ambiance for entertaining guests or simply enjoying everyday living. The modern kitchen boasts sleek countertops, high-quality appliances, and ample storage, making it a delight for culinary enthusiasts. The generously proportioned bedroom provides a peaceful haven, offering ample space for a bed and additional furnishings. The bedroom also benefits from large built in wardrobes. Natural light floods through the large window, creating a serene and relaxing atmosphere. The apartment's ground floor location ensures easy access and convenience, eliminating the need for stairs or lifts. Situated in the heart of Clerkenwell, this property enjoys close proximity to an array of local amenities, trendy cafes, renowned restaurants, and boutique shops. The vibrant neighbourhood provides a perfect balance between tranquility and cosmopolitan living. Transportation links are excellent, with several bus stops nearby and Barbican Station within a short walking distance. This offers convenient connections to the wider city, allowing you to explore London's iconic landmarks, cultural hotspots, and entertainment venues with ease whilst being a commuters dream.Our China Desk is here for you, if Chinese is your preferred language, please get in touch via WeChat (ChestertonsChinaDesk)BrochuresSuper-size images and Full Online Details ---

description: This modern townhouse, conveniently situated just off Essex Road in the vibrant Islington neighbourhood, offers a stylish and spacious living environment spread across three floors. The townhouse boasts a contemporary facade with clean lines, large windows, and a welcoming entrance.Upon entering the property, you step into a the entrance level, where you are greeted by an additional reception area, perfect for hosting guests or creating a separate relaxation space or a study space. This level also features one of the three bedrooms, complete with its own en-suite shower room, making it an ideal guest suite or a luxurious primary bedroom.The glass staircase downwards takes you thought to a light-filled and open basement reception / kitchen, providing ample space for various uses, such as a living room,  entertainment space.  This floor also includes a utility room for laundry and storage.Moving up to the first floor, you'll find two more well-appointed bedrooms. These bedrooms are thoughtfully designed with plenty of natural light and closet space. What sets this floor apart is the luxurious "Jack and Jill" bathroom, accessible from both bedrooms. This sophisticated bathroom includes high-end fixtures and fittings, creating a spa-like atmosphere.The second floor opens up to a private roof terrace, offering a serene and outdoor space to unwind, dine, or entertain. This secluded oasis is a wonderful escape from the city buzz, allowing you to enjoy your own piece of tranquillity in the heart of Islington.Throughout the townhouse, modern design elements are evident, with sleek finishes, contemporary lighting fixtures, and an emphasis on functionality and comfort. The property is equipped with all the necessary amenities to make daily living convenient and enjoyable. Located just off Essex Road in Islington, this townhouse benefits from its proximity to a vibrant array of shops, cafes, restaurants, and cultural attractions. The excellent transport links in the area ensure easy access to the rest of London, making it an ideal choice for those who desire a perfect blend of urban living and modern comfort.

description: Deposit Free Option Available! Square Quarters are excited to offer this stunning very well presented four bedroom, two reception family house spread over 3 floors with private garden, cellar and attic space ideally located in the sought after Whitehall Park catchment area nestled between Archway Underground Station & Highgate Village.In this stunning home, on the ground floor you will find a generous and homely open plan high spec fully fitted kitchen and dining area with skylights letting in an abundance of light and well-proportioned living space with feature fireplace which flows through to French doors which give access to the stunning garden space.  You also have a  2nd reception/study area also with feature fireplace, W.C and Under the stairs is a door to the cellar. On the 2nd floor you have three generous sized bedrooms, two with built in wardrobes and a modern bathroom with bath and rainfall shower head, then the 3rd floor and top floor has a spacious bedroom with built in wardrobes and massive walk in attic. This period property benefits from key classic features such as its beautiful original fireplaces and coal hatch on the porch, whilst still being lovingly modernised by the owners.Situated within the catchment area for Whitehall Park school and located comfortably between Highgate Village, Crouch End Broadway and Archway. This lovely Victorian home is conveniently located in close proximity to Archway or Highgate Stations for quick and easy transport links into Central London and The City.

description:
**Zero Deposit Guarantee Available**Holding Deposit: £242.00SUMMARYIdeally situated just a 7 minute stroll from the beautiful town centre, where you can enjoy walks around the common with a lovely cup of coffee from one of the stalls on the market or even a bite to eat at one of the many eateries Saffron Walden has to offer, is this stylish, recently renovated, one bedroom apartment.DESCRIPTIONIdeally situated just a 7 minute stroll from the beautiful town centre, where you can enjoy walks around the common with a lovely cup of coffee from one of the stalls on the market or even a bite to eat at one of the many eateries Saffron Walden has to offer, is this stylish, recently renovated, one bedroom apartment. This property benefits from modernisaton throughout with the benefit of a luxury kitchen, shower room, bi-folding doors connecting the living room to the quaint courtyard garden and neutral decoration throughout. Additonally, occupants can enjoy a beautiful communal garden, with places to sit and read a book and gated off street parking.Saffron Walden is a fine old market town with a good range of shopping, schooling and recreational facilities, including the renowned Saffron Hall, which is situated at the County High School, for its musical events etc. Audley End mainline station is just two miles distance (with fast trains to Cambridge and Liverpool Street) and the M11 access point at Stump Cross 4 miles.Holding Deposit: £242Security Deposit: £1,211Council Tax Band: AWhile every reasonable effort is made to ensure the accuracy of descriptions and content, we should make you aware of the following guidance or limitations.

description:
Pinpoint Estates offer this nicely decorated Studio Ground Flat property to let located in the popular Bury Park area of Luton offering close access to the town center, M1, university, local shops & schools, doctor’s surgeries, and other amenities in the area. This house has been kept in a very reasonable condition throughout.

Internally, there is a fitted kitchen with various wall and base units and a family size bathroom with a double bedroom. The house also benefits from gas central heating through radiators and is adequately insulated. 

Externally, there is on street parking for vehicles.

Warwick Road is located in the Bury Park area of Luton. The area is much sought after as there are local shops, retail outlets available within 500 yards plus Luton town centre is within a ten minute walk.

Viewing is highly recommended.

description: Comprising of an open plan living, dining and kitchen area it also has a Juliet balcony, creating lots of natural light. The kitchen area is also equipped with all Bosch appliances including a dishwasher and induction hob. With a bright and airy bedroom and separate en-suite shower room, this is a great apartment, with every convenience right on your doorstep.With access to London's Zone 1 within 17-20 minutes, this is the perfect place to be for a short commute into town, whilst enjoying the benefits of living in an quaint, but quieter area. Right by the apartments are numerous restaurants, supermarkets, shops and bars, in addition to the Ruislip retail park, at the end of Field End Road.  For your leisure, Ruislip Lido is only a 10-minutes walk, offering benefits such as a 60-acre lake, sandy beach and water-sports facilities. Colne Valley Regional Park is also only 5 miles away boasting 40 square miles of picturesque open countryside.For further information and to book your viewing please call the LondonPropertyGuru Lettings Team.

description: This is a gorgeous apartment on the 2nd floor (with a lift) of this popular portered building in the heart of Kensington.  The spacious reception room leads out onto a private balcony and is ideal for entertaining in the balmy summer evenings or relaxing in peace.  The modern separate kitchen is well equipped and will please enthusiastic cooks. The 2 double bedrooms are both en-suite and have plenty of storage. With wood flooring, air con and a guest loo this is a lovely home in the heart of Prime Central London. The property is ideally located in the heart of Kensington just off the extremely popular, much loved High Street Kensington. It is a very sought after area and has a fantastic array of eateries from award winning restaurants to casual bistros. High Street Kensington has long been a favoured shopping destination and has a great mix of boutiques and independent shops. It is close to transport making commuting easy. The wide open spaces of Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens are a short stroll away as are The Royal Albert Hall, the V & A and the Natural History Museum when you feel like a cultural outing. description: A brilliant two double bedroom ground floor Victorian conversion with its own front door and rear garden. Offered to the market in excellent condition. Situated within walking distance of great transport links, shopping amenities, and the popular picture house cinema.Lambeth Council Tax Band C £1566.13paSafeguarding Your InformationImportant information regarding cybercrime. It has come to our attention that computer hackers are seeking to target property transactions to access funds. As we understand it, they will either hack a phone, tablet, or PC, maybe by sending out a random email that mistakenly gets opened, or even whilst opening a website, which gives them access to that machine. The reason for us mentioning this to you is to alert you that once they have gained access, they can monitor email correspondence, without you knowing, throughout a transaction. Then, at a relevant point, e.g. just before the exchange of contracts, they can send an email to a client mirroring that of their solicitor asking for funds to be transferred to a certain bank account. That money then, of course, disappears. Fortunately, we have not had such an instance but, feel it important to highlight the fact that if you do receive an email requesting funds, it is worth checking with the person concerned by phone that it is genuine and the bank details are correct, before sending money. This could, of course, affect other areas of finance beyond the property. Solicitors are starting to highlight this point now, but for safety, we would urge you to be vigilant and check before sending money or passing on any personal details regarding any bank or credit card information.The Property Misdescriptions Act 1991These particulars are set out as a general outline in accordance with the Property Misdescriptions Act (1991) only for the guidance of intending purchasers or lessees and do not constitute any part of an offer or contract. Details are given without any responsibility, and any intending purchasers, lessees or third parties should not rely on them as statements or representations of fact but must satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise as to the correctness of each of them. We have not carried out a structural survey and the services, appliances and specific fittings have not been tested. Lease details, service charge, ground rent are given as a guide only and should be checked and confirmed by your solicitor. We believe you may benefit from using the services of our solicitors, independent financial advisors and surveyors, the Providers, who are known as Lewis Nedas Law, Bargate Murray Solicitors, Hawke Financial Services and MAP Surveyors. During the tenancy (payable to the Wilson & Nicol Properties Ltd)
For properties in England:
During the tenancy (payable to the provider) if permitted and applicable:
Utilities: gas, electricity, water
Communications: telephone and broadband
Installation of cable/satellite where permitted
Subscription to cable/satellite supplier
Television licence
Council Tax

Other permitted payments
Any other permitted payments, not included above, under the relevant legislation including contractual damages.
Tenant protection:
Wilson & Nicol Properties Ltd is a member of CMP scheme ARLA Propertymark Scheme No: C0128457, which is a client money protection scheme, and also a member of The Property Ombudsman, which is a redress scheme, membership number being D12669. You can find out more details on the agent s website or by contacting the agent directly. 
Payment of £48.00 including VAT if you want to change the tenancy agreement in any way.
Payment of interest for the late payment of rent at a rate of 3% above bank base rate, where the rent falls 14 days past the rent due date. Interest will then accrue at this rent and backdated to when the rent fell into arrears.
Payment for the reasonably incurred costs for the loss of keys/security devices at a rate of £10.00 per key and at a rate covering the total cost of the security device (fob/remote etc) including postage.
Payment of any unpaid rent or other reasonable costs associated with your early termination of the tenancy.

AGENTS NOTE: Your one week holding deposit is at risk if you:
1. Pull out of proceeding with the property 
2. Unreasonably delay the agreed commencement date without supplying Wilson & Nicol Properties Ltd with a satisfactory explanation
3. Fail to advise Wilson & Nicol Properties Ltd of any adverse credit history, which impacts reference checks carried outBrochuresBrochure

description: A fantastic 3 bedroom 1 bathroom 1 WC apartment, conveniently located in the heart of the Docklands, walking distance to Canary Wharf and its vast array of shops, bars and restaurants.  This light and airy property comprises a contemporary open plan living area with a large kitchen including integrated appliances and leads to a generous sized balcony. The apartment comprises a well-appointed living / dining area benefitting wood-flooring through-out. The large kitchen is fully equipped for modern day living, making it easy to create wonderful dishes for dinner parties and entertain guests. With 3 generously sized bedrooms with built in mirrored wardrobe this apartment is perfect for a family or 2 sharers alike.   The master bedroom has large built in sliding wardrobes and also benefits from a luxury en-suite shower room.  The second single bedroom also offers ample storage and there is also a separate family bathroom.  Furthermore, the development benefits from a 24hr concierge service, intercom security system and communal gardens.

key_features: ['EPC rating C, Council Tax Band G', 'Unfurnished', 'Stunning 4-Bed Detached Family Home', 'Double garage with light and power', 'Burton Zonie Italia range cooker with double ovens, a six-ring gas hob, and a griddle', 'Swimming Pool', 'Available 25th September 2023']
description: Welcome to this stunning 4-Bed Detached Family Haven. The front is complemented by a sweeping driveway and charming herbaceous borders.Step into the embrace of modern luxury and family comfort with 1 Highfield, a remarkable detached 4-bedroom home that combines style and practicality in a perfect blend. This property is the epitome of contemporary living, offering a haven for your family to create cherished memories.As you approach, a charming front porch and inviting front door beckon you inside, where you'll find a spacious entrance hall thoughtfully designed with coat storage. The hall seamlessly flows into the entertainment area, featuring a convenient drinks station complete with a fridge and sink.Prepare to be enchanted as you step into the heart of this home - the fabulous open-plan kitchen, dining, and family area. This expansive and well-lit space is adorned with underfloor heating and top-quality flooring. A large roof lantern showers the area with natural light, creating an inviting ambiance. The family area boasts an electric fireplace and captivating feature brick walls, adding character to the space.The kitchen is a chef's delight, boasting a comprehensive range of base units and matching eye-level cabinets, all adorned with sleek granite worktops. A central island with a breakfast bar area features an inset sink and a stylish cooker tap. The integrated appliances include a dishwasher, and the pièce de résistance is the Burton Zonie Italia range cooker with double ovens, a six-ring gas hob, and a griddle.Additional features include beautiful larder-style full-height cupboards equipped with electric points. There are inset spotlighting, and a sound system. Bifold doors open to reveal an extensive patio that rises to a higher patio and terraced area housing a swimming pool. The rest of the garden is a picturesque expanse of lush lawn, enclosed by panel fencing, with a wooden-style fence at the rear offering views over the fields beyond.The sitting room is a bright and inviting space with a bay window and ample storage. For those who work from home, the office on the ground floor offers built-in desks and storage, complete with underfloor heating for comfort. The utility room is generously sized, providing comprehensive storage space and plumbing for both a washing machine and dryer. A downstairs cloakroom, with a WC and washbasin, and an under-stairs storage cupboard complete the ground floor. An understairs cupboard houses the Worcester gas-fired boiler and the pressurized water tank, ensuring your home runs efficiently.Ascend the stairs to the first-floor landing, a bright and welcoming space with access to the loft. The principal suite is a sanctuary, offering a dressing area and an ensuite shower room featuring his and hers washbasins, a WC, a walk-in shower, and a heated towel rail. Three additional double bedrooms on this floor provide ample space for family and guests, while the family bathroom offers a relaxing bath with a mounted shower, a washbasin, a WC, and a heated towel rail. A useful linen cupboard on the landing provides extra storage.The property includes a double garage with light and power.This fabulous property is more than just a house; it's a statement of contemporary luxury and family living.EPC Rating C, Council Tax Band G. Available 25th September 2023. Unfurnished.EPC Rating: C

description: STUNNING FAMILY HOUSE IN FINCHAMPSTEAD  Located in the sought-after Finchampstead area of Wokingham close to all amenities and in catchments for Wokingham's schools, known for their great reputation and available for all ages, this executive property is stunning in so many ways, not least that it sits within a quarter acre of landscaped garden and presented immaculately with high quality finishes, fixtures and fittings.As you enter the driveway with access to the double garage, the first impression is of a well-designed detached house with double garage and well-maintained driveway sufficient for at least eight cars.  The entrance to the property itself is light, bright, spacious and grand, with plenty of room for displays or seating if desired.  The wooden flooring throughout is especially pleasing and welcoming. A study, large enough for several people offers bespoke built-in bookshelves, cupboards and desk space on three sides.  Further along, the coat and shoe cupboards are handy for visitors and residents, as well as the downstairs cloakroom. Further accommodation on the ground floor comprises the extensive living room with more than enough space for seating and entertaining. A second extremely large reception room opens onto the garden and adds another completely new dimension onto the property.  To the rear of this room is also access to the garage. The kitchen is supplemented with a generous utility room and door opening onto the side access, housing the washing machine and space for the tumble dryer. All whitegoods in both kitchen and utility room are Siemens appliances, plus a super-sized Miele fridge/freezer, five-ring gas cooker and enough worktop space for a good number of budding chefs! Upstairs, the landing has two double sets of built-in storage cupboards; the main bedroom is spacious enough to accommodate sofas and super king size beds, and leads onto the ensuite with bath and separate shower unit, plus three sets of walk-in wardrobes. The ensuite to the main bedroom includes both bath and separate shower unit. The second bedroom is similarly spacious and has its own ensuite with both bath and separate shower, and walk-in wardrobes. Bedrooms three and four again are large double bedrooms, number three having walk-in wardrobes and number four having built-in closets. Both bedrooms three and four are complemented by the modern family bathroom situated between both rooms for ease of access.  Heating-wise, gas central heating is installed with two separate thermostats to control the upstairs and downstairs temperatures individually. Naturally the whole property has double glazing throughout.  Externally the private garden is the coup de grace for this stunning family home, boasting a large well-maintained lawn, patio, shrubbery, and to the rear the summer house is shaded by a good selection of trees and shrubs.  The property is offered unfurnished or if desired, part-furnished with the possibility of various items of furniture being included. Well-mannered pets will be considered, and the property is available 1st September.  Viewing definitely highly recommended.

Fixed Term with a minimum of 12 month.DESCRIPTION*Zero Deposit Option Available*This Grade2 listed building, situated on the edge of Village Green, next door to The Oak Public House, was built around 1850 and remained in use until 1993 serving both the farming and domestic communities.Totally refurbished inside and out in 2001, it retains all the original features of a working forge including two brick forges and original bellows.The ground floor is  open plan, it comprises of a double bedroom, lounge, dressing room or office, fully fitted kitchen includes Washing machine and Fridge and new cooker, bathroom, sundry other spaces and plenty of storage.With great kerb side appeal (you should see the inside…) and the best location in the village, it should appeal to anyone with an historic but contemporary bent, who values the benefits of living in a local but expanding village atmosphere.3 miles from Haverhill, 8 miles from the historic market town of Saffron Walden and close to the Suffolk/Essex/Cambridgeshire borders.Easy Access to commute to and from Great Chesterford, Audley End and Cambridge Rail links.The utility bills are part in credit and can be discussed directly with the landlordHolding deposit: £207Deposit: £1038Council tax band: TBCWhile every reasonable effort is made to ensure the accuracy of descriptions and content, we should make you aware of the following guidance or limitations.

description: Pearson Keehan are excited to launch this superb newly built four bedroom family home set in one of Steyning's most prestigious addresses. With over 2,000 square feet of living space, this semi-detached house has been built to an exceptional standard and further benefits from three bathrooms, off-street parking and landscaped rear garden. Spanning over three storeys, underfloor heating serves the whole of the ground floor with the accommodation briefly comprising of spacious bay-fronted living room, handy utility room, cloakroom and magnificent open plan kitchen/dining room complete with integrated appliances and central island. This part of the home is a particular feature of the property, providing the perfect space for entertaining and dining with friends & family. A large skylight and bi-folding doors pour in tremendous amounts of light to this room with the latter providing access out on to the rear garden.Moving upstairs to the first floor, you have bedroom three to the rear and spacious main bedroom to the front which boasts a large walk-in wardrobe, en suite shower room and far-reaching views of the South Downs. On the second floor, a contemporary family bathroom is found along with bedroom 4 and another generously sized bedroom to the front which also enjoys some lovely views and en suite shower facilities.Outside of the property, a block-paved driveway provides off-street parking for numerous vehicles. The rear garden is mainly laid to lawn and has a paved patio area directly off the kitchen.In terms of location, Goring Road is one of Steyning's most sought-after addresses and is conveniently located just around the corner from the main high street where a number of amenities can be found including coffee shops, gastro pubs and supermarkets. Furthermore a number of local schools are within easy reach and the A27/A23 transport links are also easily accessible.BrochuresGoring Road, SteyningBrochure

description: Well presented 3 bedroom apartment to rent in this highly sought after location offering excellent access to the city centre and science parks.The development is approached by a gravel drive leading to the block of 8 apartments built to the highest specification.The property features entrance hall with storage cupboard housing washing machine and guest bathroom. Spacious open plan living room, patio doors to balcony and wooden engineered flooring. Fully integrated kitchen with granite worktop to include dishwasher, oven, hob, microwave and American style fridge-freezer. Principal bedroom with bay window, contemporary and stylish ensuite shower room, two further double bedrooms both with ensuite shower rooms. The property has been built to passive housing standards with triple glazing, ground source heat pump and 1 meter thick walls. They also feature air-condition which has been installed throughout. Heating, cooling and water costs are charged at an additional fixed rate and paid directly to the landlord.There is a generously sized private balcony. Bicycle storage. Resident permit parking for 3 cars. Furnished.Council Tax Band TBC. However we would advise you to clarify the council tax band on  The landlord will be looking for a 12 month initial  tenancy but may be open to negotiation.The Holding deposit for the property will be £617.00 and the deposit £3085.00 subject to the rent being as advertised.Grosvenor Court is situated to the north of the City within easy walking or cycling distance of the centre and many of the facilities offered by the University. There is excellent schooling for all age groups within the area and within walking distance of the well-regarded Independent Prep schools of St John College and Kings College Schools. A short walk and you can be at The Grand Arcade the city's main shopping centre, the Grafton Centre and Fitzroy Street with a variety of shops. There are also restaurants, hotels and a Sainsbury's superstore located at Eddington which is a short 15 minute walk.

description:
Two Bedroom Canalside Apartment, Short Walk to City Centre & Train Station, Close to Central Park, Residents' Lounge with Free Tea/Coffee, WiFi Connected Work Zones, Pet Friendly, Free Broadband, On-Site Team

One Canalside is a recently constructed waterside community located just a short walk from Chelmsford city centre, train station and Central park. Here you can enjoy modern city style apartments while being on the edge of some of Essex's finest countryside. One Canalside is a place where you have freedom. To paint your walls and make home - feel like home. Relax in our Residents' lounge with free Barista quality coffee. Stay connected in Resident work zones with free Wifi. Host meetings outside of your home in the Residents' meeting room. As if these amenities aren't enough, we're excited to offer a games room with a pool table and arcade machines, and an impressive private dining room. This property includes beautiful Nordic Oak flooring with warm Dove Grey carpets in bedrooms, high quality German kitchens, sleek Catalonian 3-piece bathroom suite and integrated Electrolux washer/dryer, induction hob, oven and dishwasher. Most homes come with private outdoor space, whether a charming balcony or wrap around terrace boasting 360 degree views. Every bedroom includes a built-in wardrobe with floor to ceiling mirror. Free super-fast 150MB broadband comes as standard. And on top of this, your home will be well insulated with double glazed windows and well sound-proofed with high quality soundproofing materials used to separate homes. The One Canalside team are on site 7 days a week to answer your questions, maintain the building and your home, and to ensure you have a stress free renting experience. please note photos are of the show flat. Call today to book a viewing. 
Important InformationThe rent is exclusive of utilities and council tax.Minimum term: 12 monthsDeposit: £1,430Availability: 19th OctoberNo PetsNon SmokersEPC: BCouncil tax band DProspective applicants will be required to pay a Holding Deposit to the Canalside Team of £200.Once the holding deposit has been received, Fenn Wright will suspend marketing of the rental property for a period of 15 calendar days subject to referencing commencing promptly. Upon successful references being completed, acceptable and the tenancy being confirmed by Fenn Wright, the holding deposit paid will then contribute towards the first month's rental payment.BrochuresParticulars

description: A charming 4-bedroom detached family residence nestled in the highly desirable Old Basing village. This property features a convenient downstairs cloakroom, an inviting open-plan lounge/diner, a kitchen complete with a breakfast bar, and a generously proportioned rear living room. Enjoy the tranquility of an enclosed rear garden and the convenience of an attached garage with driveway parking. Upstairs, discover three ample double bedrooms, one cozy single bedroom, and a well-appointed family bathroom boasting a separate shower. Situated near local schools, convenient amenities, and excellent transport connections for your family's ease.  DOUBLE GLAZED DOOR TO   ENTRANCE HALL  Stairs to first floor, laminate flooring. CLOAKROOM  Front aspect double glazed window, corner sink unit, low level W.C and half tiled walls LIVING ROOM 20' 0" x 15' 4 (6.1m x 4.7m) Dual aspect double glazed window, two radiators, deep understairs storage cupboard, serving hatch from kitchen and folding doors to kitchen/breakfast KITCHEN/BREAKFAST ROOM 16' 2" x 14' 9" (4.9m x 4.5m) Two front aspect double glazed windows and double glazed door to garden. Acrylic 1.5 bowl sink unit with mixer taps with single drainer with cupboard under, further range of cupboards and drawers, under cabinet fridge and freezer, dishwasher and electric cooker. Door to garage  FIRST FLOOR LANDING  Airing cupboard with boiler BEDROOM 1 12' 6" x 9' 2" (3.8m x 2.8m) Front aspect double glazed window and radiator. BEDROOM 2 9' 2" x 7' 8" (2.8m x 2.3m) Side aspect double glazed window, access to loft space via hatch and radiator. BEDROOM 3 9' 10" x 7' 5" (3m x 2.3m) Rear aspect double glazed window and radiator. BEDROOM 4 9' 9" x 7' 5" (3m x 2.3m) Rear aspect double glazed window and radiator. BATHROOM  Front aspect double glazed window, bath with mixer taps and shower attachment, pedestal wash hand basin, low level W.C and separate shower cubicle and radiator OUTSIDE   FRONT  Lawned area, with path to front door. Driveway Parking  REAR  Enclosed garden, small patio area and outside tap GARAGE  Single up and over door with utility area to rear APPLICATIONS  A holding deposit equivalent to 1 weeks rent will be required to reserve the property while referencing checks are being carried out. With the tenants' consent this holding deposit will be refunded against the first month's rent. The holding deposit can be retained if the applicant provides false or misleading information, fails Right to Rent checks, withdraws from the property or fails to take reasonable steps to enter into the tenancy.  In accordance with the Tenant Fees Act applicants will be required to enter into the tenancy agreement no more than 15 days after paying the holding deposit. Failure to do so for any of the afore mentioned reasons may result in you losing your holding deposit. An extension to the deadline may be entered into if agreed in writing by all parties.  Pets  If a tenancy is agreed to include pets, an additional £50 per month in rent will be payable for the duration or the tenancy. Right to Rent Checks By law, Right to Rent checks must be carried and as such will be required to provide proof of ID and address in accordance with Home Office guidelines. More information can be found at:   Reference Checks and Credit Worthiness  All applicants will be subject to a credit check carried out by a 3rd party to check for CCJs and IVAs Applicants will need to provide proof of an income of at least 2.5 x annual rent. We will also carry out employment checks, affordability checks, previous landlord reference and proof of address history, usually up to 3 years. Documentation that will be required Passport, driving licence, utility bill dated in the last 3 months (for proof of address) and payslips.  MATERIAL INFORMATION  Council Tax Band: DEPC DTenancy Term: 12 Months (with a 6-month break clause)Rent: £1750 per month plus £50 per month if you have a petDeposit: £2019 (or £2076 if you have a pet)  BrochuresLettings Brochure

description:
Introducing one of the best apartments to the rental market, in the ever-popular Tanners Wharf Development of Bishops Stortford.

This exceptionally large two-bedroom apartment is situated on the third floor with the inclusion of an open-plan living area, leading onto a private balcony area which overlooks the communal gardens. The kitchen area is complimented with fitted wall and base units finished in a high gloss finishing, including wooden oak worktops and integrated appliances.

Offered furnished and immaculately presented throughout with modern fixtures and fittings, there is also a family sized fully tiled bathroom with fitted wall and floor ceramic tiles, including an en-suite shower room adjacent to the master bedroom.

Tanners Wharf is renowned for its high-quality finish and close proximity to Bishops Stortford Town Centre. The development is a 5-minute walk to the mainline rail station which offers direct services to London Liverpool Street, Stansted Airport and Cambridge, making this an ideal property for commuters and airport staff.BrochuresBrochure 1

description: Set in the heart of Ashdown forest, but with easy access to Nutley is this Three bedroom detached house with Double garage and office.As you arrive you will be greeted with a secluded driveway which takes you direct to the property and its neighbour. The entrance to the property is gated.Parking up you will see that there is a double garage to your right, which also has a loft conversion which can be used for storage or a separate office room. Next to the garage is a purpose built office which has a broadband connection as well as overlooking the small stream which runs alongside the property.Heading back to the house there are three entrances, the main door, sliding doors to the lounge and a further door which overlooks the stream. On the ground floor you will find the living room, two double bedrooms with wardrobes, fitted kitchen, utility room, bathroom (with separate shower) and separate WC.The loft provides a further bedroom, with bath and toilet as well a small study area.This is certainly a property full of character and comes to the market Unfurnished and will allow pets.Council Tax Band “F”

The property is in good condition throughout and comprises of a large living room leading into a modern kitchen and an open-plan dining room. The kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of work surface areas along with cupboard storage. 

The first floor has two good-sized bedrooms and a modern bathroom.   

The property also has off-street parking and a spacious garden area containing a large path and area of lawn. A viewing is highly recommended.

Hornhill Road is not far from local amenities to include convenience stores, supermarkets, pubs, restaurants, cafes. Maple Cross has several local schools along with a range of parks and lakes. description: JOHNS&CO is proud to present this stunning one double bedroom apartment located in the ground-breaking Royal Wharf development. This beautiful apartment is the epitome of luxury living with a private east facing balcony and a high quality finished kitchen and bathroom. This fantastic apartment is offered furnished by a hand picked luxury furniture supplier.  Royal Wharf is conveniently located between Pontoon Dock and Custom House DLR stations with speedy access to Canary Wharf in 12 minutes and London City Airport in 4 minutes. The development benefits from landscaped communal gardens and 24-hour concierge and security service. Also the Royal Wharf Thames Clipper stop is fully operational. Residents have access to a state of art 20,000 sq ft clubhouse with 25m swimming pool, hydro-pool, sauna, steam room, tropical rainshower and fully equipped gym. Onsite there is a Fullers Pub, Starbucks, Sainsburys, pharmacy, nail salon, dentist, bistro, coffee shop and community center. Photos are of an example unit.

description:
RENOVATED APARTMENT - MODERN FULLY FITTED KITCHEN- MODERN BATHROOM - LARGE LIVING SPACE - FLOOR TO CEILING BUILT IN WARDROBES- NEUTRALLY DECORATED - HARD FLOORING - GAS FIRED CENTRAL HEATING - PARKING - MINUTES FROM TOWN
Hunters are delighted to exclusively bring to the market this superb, two bedroom ground floor apartment.  Positioned within minutes of Haywards Heath town centre, whilst also being ideally situated only a few minutes walk to the hospital and a 10-15 minute walk to the station.  Apartments offering high spec, good size living accommodation whilst  boasting parking rarely come to the market.   The apartment in comprises of: -Entrance hallway, with hard wood karndean flooring flowing from the entrance hallway, into the living room and kitchen.  The property boasts a superb, fully tiled, fitted bathroom suite boasting bath and up and over shower.  The stylish kitchen benefits from ample cupboard and worktop space, whilst also boasting electric integrated oven, induction hob, free-standing washing machine, fridge and freezer.  Both bedrooms are double rooms with the master bedroom benefiting from floor to ceiling built in wardrobes.  The large/open planned living space is a superb place to relax with views of the communal ground which allow an abundance of natural light into the room.The apartment has two large built in storage cupboards in the hallway, whilst also benefiting from a brand new boiler offering gas fired central heating.  The apartment comes fully double glazed, has parking and is presented in a neutral condition throughout.  With the apartment offering so much whilst being available from mid-September onwards, early viewings are a must to avoid missing out.Please note the holding fee payable to secure the property is £265 and the security deposit is £1,326.

description: Introducing a larger than average studio apartment, set within the iconic Barbican Estate, a fabulous location for anybody wanting to live in the heart of Central London! Positioned on the third floor, the accommodation includes a large, open plan reception/bedroom space, plus a fully fitted kitchen. A sliding door offers access to a delightful west facing balcony. The property even boasts an "original bathroom", a true and popular feature of abodes within the Estate.Two communal gardens, 24 hour concierge within the building, and a real community atmosphere are just some of the many delights of being a Barbican resident.Local amenities include an array of bars, restaurants and the One New Change shopping complex, which also has plenty of options to eat and drink in. Transport links could not be any better at all, with both Barbican tube station (Circle, Hammersmith and City and Metropolitan Lines), and the fantastically quick and efficient Elizabeth Line also nearby.Available immediately, furnished.

description: Henry Adams Lettings in Haywards Heath are delighted to offer this recently refurbished and immaculately presented, 3 bedroom detached house, complete with sizeable rear garden and attached garage, situated at the end of a sought after residential close in the popular village of Hassocks. EPC - C. The property has been comprehensively refurbished throughout, with neutrally decorated walls, contemporary carpets / flooring / blinds, modern kitchen with various appliances and a stylish new bathroom.Accommodation briefly comprises an enclosed entrance porch / lobby with space for shoes / boots / cloaks, a door leading in to a spacious hallway with under stairs storage cupboard and stylish ceramic tiled flooring throughout, a spacious bright and airy lounge / sitting room, a large open plan kitchen / dining room situated at the rear of the house. The kitchen is modern and boasts dark granite effect work surfaces with a breakfast bar and white cupboards / units below, an oven, a hob with an extractor above, a fridge / freezer, a slim-line dishwasher, a washing machine. This is also space for a sizeable dining table and a door leading out to the rear garden.Upstairs the property boasts a bright and airy landing area with built in storage cupboard, separate first floor WC with stylish ceramic tiled flooring, modern bathroom with ceramic flooring, bath, shower over, glass screen, wash basin with vanity cupboard below and a chrome heated towel rail. There are two well proportioned double bedrooms, both of which boast built in wardrobes and bedroom three is a standard sized single bedroom / nursery / study.Outside the property boasts a front garden which is predominantly laid to lawn. The rear garden is sizeable and laid to lawn with secure fencing to all sides. The landlord has arranged for the grass to be cut regularly at their expense so this is included in the rental price.The property is available 'unfurnished' and boasts gas fired central heating and double glazing. Council Tax Band E.Pet Clause Should the Landlord of this property agree for pets to be considered before or during the Tenancy, Tenants are advised that there will be an increased monthly rent of £15pcm for the first pet, and a further £10pcm for each additional pet thereafter.  This amount will be non-refundable at the end of the tenancy as it will form part of the monthly rental amount and is not a deposit.Hallway A spacious hallway with under stairs storage cupboard and stylish ceramic tiled flooring throughout.Lounge / Sitting Room Spacious bright and airy lounge / sitting room with views over the front garden.Open Plan Kitchen / Dining Room A large open plan kitchen / dining room situated at the rear of the house. The kitchen is modern and boasts dark granite effect work surfaces with white cupboards / units below, oven, hob, extractor above, fridge / freezer, slim-line dishwasher, washing machine, breakfast bar, space for a sizeable dining table and door leading out to the rear garden.Landing Area A bright and airy landing area with built in airing / linen cupboard.Bedroom 1 A well proportioned double bedroom with built in wardrobes and views over the front garden.Bedroom 2 A well proportioned double bedroom with built in wardrobe and views over the rear garden.Bedroom 3 / Nursery / Study A standard sized bedroom or nursery or study.Bath / Shower Room A modern bathroom with ceramic flooring, bath, shower over, glass screen, wash basin with vanity cupboard below and a chrome heated towel rail. Cloakroom with WC First floor WC with stylish ceramic tiled flooring,Garden Outside the property boasts a front garden which is predominantly laid to lawn. The rear garden is sizeable and laid to lawn with secure fencing to all sides. The landlord has arranged for the grass to be cut regularly at their expense so this is included in the rental price.Garage Attached single garage with power / light and up / over door to the front and personnel door a the rear leading out to the rear garden.Driveway Parking Driveway parking.Central Heating Gas fired central heating.Double Glazing Double Glazing.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION For clarification, Henry Adams wish to inform prospective tenants that these lettings particulars have been prepared in good faith to give a fair overall view of the property. We have not undertaken a structural survey, nor tested that any of the services, appliances, equipment or facilities are in good working order. Any area, distances or measurements referred to are given as a GUIDE ONLY and should not be relied upon. If such details are fundamental to a let please contact this office for further information. All measurements are approximate and should not be relied upon for carpets or furnishings. Photographs within our detailed particulars/brochure may include lifestyle and or local views pictures. Also there may be internal/external photographs including chattels not included with the property for let. description: PROPERTY LOCATION  The property is set within a popular historic village of Rottingdean close to the pebbled beach and seafront promenade which extends to the Brighton Marina and Saltdean. Rottingdean village has local shops, cafes and local pubs situated close by to the duck pond and Kipling gardens. Ideal for people looking for a lifestyle of being near the sea and walking around the downs. PROPERTY DESCRIPTION  The property having been refurbished offers a spacious open plan living with plenty of light throughout. Rooms comprise of:Communal entrance with stairs to first floor and through door to entrance door. Stairs leading to 2nd floor landing with access to the following rooms.Living room which is open plan with fully fitted Kitchen. The room comprises of a breakfast table with 4 chairs, sofa and in the Kitchen all appliances include Hotpoint washing machine, Zanussi electric cooker, hob and extractor fan and Lec Fridge. 2 large windows to the front with views over Rottingdean to the sea.Shower room  with shower cubicle and shower, wash basin and low level WC. Bedroom 1  - Double bedroom with window to rear and double bed with mattress.Stairs leading up to top floorBedroom with single bed and feature Velux's letting in plenty of light. Shower room  - Fully fitted with shower cubicle and shower and low level WC. Council Tax B.The property is ideal for a working professional couple or family with 1 upper to senior school age child due to many stairs. Landlord requests guarantor for potential tenants.Available now to move in. Viewings by appointment only.    A holding deposit equivalent to 1 weeks rent will be required to reserve the property while referencing checks are being carried out. With the tenants' consent this holding deposit will be refunded against the first month's rent. The holding deposit can be retained if the applicant provides false or misleading information, fails Right to Rent checks, withdraws from the property or fails to take reasonable steps to enter into the tenancy. In accordance with the Tenant Fees Act applicants will be required to enter into the tenancy agreement no more than 15 days after paying the holding deposit. Failure to do so for any of the afore mentioned reasons may result in you losing your holding deposit. An extension to the deadline may be entered into if agreed in writing by all parties.

description:
A beautiful character home in the heart of Henley-on-Thames. Available for a 6 month Let
DescriptionSet in an enviable position in the town is this immaculately presented and furnished 3 bed character home. The property offers a good size living room with solid wooden floor, open to the well appointed kitchen which has plenty of room for dining. There is rear access to a courtyard garden which has side access to the road and a cellar with excellent storage, accessed through the living room. Upstairs are two double bedrooms, both with built in wardrobes. The principal bedroom boasts an en suite bathroom and there is a further shower room with under floor heating. To the second floor is a third double bedroom. The house is furnished throughout to a high specification by Brook House of Henley-on-Thames.LocationSet in a sought after street in Henley-on-Thames close to the river, located amongst other period character properties.  Close to all services and facilities in Henley-on-Thames, cafe's, restaurants, theatre, cinema and with access to various social and sporting events of vibrant Henley-on-Thames.  Close to the train station, and with good access to the M40, M4, London, Reading and Oxford.  Near to open countryside of South Oxfordshire and the beautiful Chiltern Hills, there are countless public footpaths, bridleways and the Thames path to explore.Square Footage: 1,390 sq ft

DirectionsFrom our office in Bell Street, continue down New Street to the river, following the road round to the traffic lights at the crossroads.  Continue straight over the crossroads with the river on the left, then turn right into Friday street where the property can be found around 100m on your left (before the turn into Queen Street).Postcode RG9 1AH 
Additional InfoDeposit payable: £2,884.62 (5 weeks rent)Holding Deposit: £576.92 (1 weeks rent)BrochuresWeb Details

description: Situated in the heart of Zone 1, 250 City Road is within a short distance of Old Street and Angel. Every room has a view - with residences on the upper floors offering a spectacular panorama of the Capital. Outside, 1.9 acres of beautifully landscaped green spaces and secluded courtyards create a sense of calm, connected and contemporary living.Stunning 2 bedroom apartment, overlooking the the cental plaza that will play host to cafés, restaurants, retail outlets and creative workspaces. Public areas are fully Wi-Fi enabled, while residents can enjoy five-star facilities from a state-of-the art gym, indoor pool and spa, to the business lounge, residents' lounge, 24-hour concierge service and 7th floor rooftop terrace. With everything on your doorstep there is no need to go far to find what you are looking for.Workplaces in the City and central London are just a short walk away, and beyond the tenth floors of the two towers a panorama of London opens up before you. Whether north west towards Angel or south east towards Old Street, the seamless link with the City continues at street level. Each tower nestles beside the adjacent buildings to provide welcoming pedestrian avenues that lead onto the wide central plaza. These integral residential towers effortlessly connect the extensive public parkland with the courtyards and gardens that lie between City Road and the quiet residential streets behindThe exterior architecture and interior designs share the same design-led approach. Apartments at the base enjoy a natural stone façade complemented by aluminium windows. The tower above follows the same window designs as well as complementary anodised aluminium panels. The overall effect is a breath-taking addition to this visionary new neighbourhood.250 City Road goes beyond everyday expectations. As you make your way through 1.9 acres of beautifully landscaped Wi-Fi enabled public realm, the captiating open spaces that characterise this new quarter, you will discover new shops, cafés and restaurants - all within just a few steps of your front door. Three floors of versatile cutting edge office space, iBasin is ideal for forward thinking companies in a prime London location. This is the perfect balance between comfort and functionality.Available NOW. Quick Viewing Highly RecommendedOur China Desk is here for you, if Chinese is your preferred language, please get in touch via WeChat (ChestertonsChinaDesk)BrochuresSuper-size images and Full Online Details ---

description: Located on this popular residential street in North Finchley, we are excited to present this modern two bedroom period flat situated on the first floor of this character filled building. Boasting bright and spacious interiors, offering a wealth of amenities on your doorstep.This charming dwelling offers a separate reception room, modern fully equipped fitted kitchen with integrated appliances and mod cons great for entertaining, two bedrooms (one double plus a single) and a stylish separate three-piece family bathroom suite. The property offers good storage space and an abundance of natural light. Property is presented to a good standard with wood floors throughout.Churchfield Avenue is a popular, tree-lined residential street in N12. The property is within walking distance from all of the High Street shops with great amenities of North Finchley and Friern Barnet has to offer. There is excellent transport links within easy reach of Finchley Central and West Finchley Station with trains to the City and Central London. description: Nestled in the heart of the Bromley North village, this delightful 2bedroom split-level rental property offers a perfect blend of modern living and classic charm. With its inviting interiors, convenient location, and an abundance of natural light, this residence is a true gem. Offered unfurnished and available beginning of October 2023.The unique split-level layout of this property adds character and a sense of space, making it feel like a true home. It offers separation and privacy between the living areas and bedrooms which are located on the first floor, and both include beautifully fitted en-suite bathrooms. The bathrooms are tastefully designed with quality fixtures and finishes ensuring your daily routines are both convenient and enjoyable.To the second floor you will discover an inviting living room that welcomes you with warm, neutral tones with natural light. This cozy living area is perfect for relaxation and entertainment. The well-appointed kitchen features sleek countertops, contemporary appliances, ample eave storage, and a convenient dining area.Step outside to a private outdoor space where you can enjoy entertaining, summer bbq’s or just sit and take in the peaceful surroundings . The serene garden provides a great escape to city life.Further benefits to mention are convenient off-road parking, fitted electric blinds, air conditioning, washer/dryer utility area, WC on the second floor, built in bedroom wardrobes and under floor heating. This rental property is maintained in impeccable condition, ensuring that you can move in with ease and enjoy a comfortable lifestyle from day one.Palace Grove in Bromley is renowned for its peaceful atmosphere. Residents benefit from easy access to nearby parks, schools, Glades shopping centre, restaurants, pubs and excellent transport links, including a short distance to Bromley South Station.Viewing: By appointment via Truepenny’s.Truepenny’s Property Consultants for themselves and for the owner of this property for whom we act as agents, give notice of the following: (1) these particulars do not constitute any part of an offer or contract, (2) all statements contained within these particulars are made without responsibility on the part of the Landlord/Vendor or Truepenny’s Property Consultants, (3) none of the statements contained within these particulars are to be relied upon as a statement of representation or fact, (4) any intending tenant/buyer must satisfy him/herself by inspection or otherwise as to the correctness of each of the statements contained within these particulars, (5) the Landlord/Vendor does not make or give either Truepenny’s Property Consultants or any person in their employment any authority to make or give representation or warranty whatsoever in relation to this property. (5) any computer generated images, virtually staged images, artist’s impressions and floorplans are used purely for illustrative purposes only. They are intended to show what furnishings or fixtures could look like at the property and does not necessarily represent the actual furnishings and fixtures which maybe present at the time of inspection.

description: Available NOW, on an unfurnished basis. Professional PAYE (pay as you earn) working tenants only (no self employed applicants please). Clean credit history essential. THERE IS NO ALLOCATED/PERMIT PARKING AVAILABLE WITH THIS PROPERTY.Set within Warley Hill, this well presented first floor apartment is a 'must see' property. Brentwood main line station, with service to London Liverpool Street, is within walking distance, with Brentwood's busy High Street shopping, resturants and bars also easily accessible. The property has been finished to an excellent standard.Communal entrance door with security entry phone access opening to communal lobby. Private entrance door, with staircase to first floor.Split Level Landing with smooth plastered ceiling and inset spotlights. Fitted carpet.Open Plan Living Room/Kitchen 16'0 x 10'3 with two double glazed windows to front. Smooth plastered ceiling with inset spotlights. The fitted kitchen features a great range of base and wall mounted cabinets. Integrated appliances include dishwasher (washing machine in enclosed within shower room), fridge/freezer and oven/hob and extractor hood. description:
*ADVERTISED RENT INCLUDES 2 WEEKS RENT FREE - EXCLUSIVE SEPTEMBER OFFER*

This brand new pet-friendly three-bedroom apartment is ideal for sharers or couples, or those looking for a spacious living space. Complete with three river-view balconies, the apartment has the best sunset in Nine Elms.

Located on the 6th floor, the stunning three-bedroom apartment includes 3 bathrooms (2 ensuite bathrooms), built-in wardrobes, storage closets, and an extra large open living space complete with a kitchen island and a separate dining area.

Two of the bedrooms have direct access to a shared balcony with the third bedroom having direct access to a private balcony, all with views of the river.

Book your tour today and be among the first to visit our brand-new development.
Entertain friends in the open-plan living room/kitchen featuring all Smeg appliances. 

Living spaces and bedrooms have floor-to-ceiling windows, underfloor heating, and a cooling system. Spacious bathrooms feature built-in storage, rainfall showers, and bathtubs.

Living spaces also feature balcony access and are complete with a kitchen island and a separate dining area.

Amenities: 
All the amenities you need for better living. WFH in your choice of amenity spaces including a dedicated co-working space and meeting rooms or your choice of the resident lounges on the ground floor and 17th floor. 
For a special occasion, host a dinner party in the demonstration kitchen and private dining lounge.
Skip the happy hour crowd and chill in the sky bar and lounge, overlooking the river and the best of central London on the 17th floor. Other on-site amenities include a 24/7 gym. swimming pools, rooftop terraces, piano lounge

Location: 
Bloom Nine Elms is moments from central London by Tube, bike, and foot. Battersea Power Station Shopping Centre is just steps away for restaurants, bars, shops and more.
Bloom Nine Elms is a riverside location in Zone 1, near Battersea Power Station, you can experience the best luxury rental property Nine Elms has to offer.

*Images are representative of the variety of flats available at Bloom, Nine Elms.
* Smeg appliances
* 3rd floor 
* Open-plan living spaces
* Two balconies
* Underfloor heating
* Floor-to-ceiling-windows
* Built-in storage
* Separate washer and dryer
* Comfort cooling
* En-suite bathrooms 
* Pet Friendly
* Parcel service
* Dedicated Property Manager and Onsite Team

Unparalleled amenity spaces
* Onsite 24/7 Premium Gym
* Rooftop pools
* Kid's Club
* Rooftop terrace with fire pits and panoramic views of central London
* Co-working space with meeting rooms
* Demonstration kitchen
* Private dining lounge
* Exclusive resident events

 *Concession* Price based on 12 month contract with 2 weeks rent free included. After 2 weeks rent free the monthly cost will be £4995.  *Terms & Conditions apply*.

description: Property Reference: 1729444.This flat has been the owners home for 15 years. It has just had a full refurb, including high spec kitchen and bathroom. All the fixtures and fittings are quality. There is a huge hallway leading into the open plan living area giving a very spacious feel. Both bedrooms are a good size and light floods in from huge windows throughout. There are 2 showers and a jucuzzi bath, The flat is 2nd floor giving you maximum privacy yet open to the surrounding forests offering a secluded & tranquil location.AVAILABLE FOR SHORT AMD LONG TERM BOOKINGS (1 MONTH - 18 MONTHS)Top floor penthouse with a well look after communal garden and communal parking. Uniquely decorated with beautiful furnishings and high-end appliances. The house is situated in a the centre of Sunninghill village a short walk to Ascot train station, Ascot Racecourse, sunninghill high street and some beautiful restaurants and cafes. The house is located in a quant village setting yet is still a short drive to Wentworth and many other great attractions such as Ascot Racecourse, Windsor Castle, Lego Land, Thorpe Park. There are also some local gems to visit like Bracknell Forest, Virginia Water and plenty of top restaurants and pubs a short taxi ride away. Happy to recommend some great local places to visit depending on your interests.All bills included except energy. Bedrooms: 2Beds: 3Bathrooms: 2Discounts available for long term bookings (over 6 months - please ask). Please make an enquiry for the specific dates you are requesting and will come back to you with a price for that exact date, the price of this property varies depending on season.Summary & Exclusions:- Rent Amount: £4,150.00 per month (£957.69 per week)- Deposit / Bond: £1,915.38- 2 Bedrooms- 2 Bathrooms- Property comes furnished- Available to move in from 07 September, 2023- Minimum tenancy term is 1 months- Maximum number of tenants is 4- No Students- Pets considered / by arrangement- No Smokers- Family Friendly- Bills not included- Property has parking- Property has garden access- EPC Rating: D  If calling, please quote reference: 1729444  Fees:You will not be charged any admin fees. ** Contact today to book a viewing and have the landlord show you round! ** Request Details form responded to 24/7, with phone bookings available 9am-9pm, 7 days a week.

description: A wonderfully refurbished mid terrace Victorian home in Askew Village with a bright double reception room with a feature bay window with parquet floor throughout. This room steps down into a tastefully refurbished kitchen/diner perfect for both entertaining and modern family living. The kitchen comes complete with high spec appliances, a large island with solid marble counter top that doubles as a breakfast bar.Percy Road is a quiet residential street in Askew Village and positioned well for the green space of Ravenscourt Park. Located just off Askew Road, it is positioned ideally for its array of local shops, bars and restaurants. The award winning ginger pig butchers, The Eagle with its excellent pub garden and Café Louche are local favourites. Ravenscourt Park (District line) as well as Goldhawk Road (Hammersmith & City line & Circle line) as well as Shepherds Bush (Central line) are all nearby offering excellent connections into town. The flat is also ideally located for the array of shops, restaurants and amenities of Westfield and those surrounding the development at the BBC Television Centre.

key_features: ['Sensational views of the river Thames and London Landmarks', 'Principal bedroom en-suite with a dressing area', 'Further generously sized bedroom', 'Two bath/shower rooms', '24 hour concierge and security', 'Residents gym and swimming pool', 'EPC Rating = B']
description:
A sensational two bedroom apartment with far reaching, dual aspect views across London and The River Thames. 
DescriptionThis fantastic apartment in the desirable South Bank Tower offers the ultimate riverside lifestyle, boasting sensational panoramic views of iconic London landmarks including the London Eye and the Houses of Parliament. The large open plan reception/dining room has floor to ceiling glass window allowing for an abundance of natural light, access to a winter garden and the views to be enjoyed throughout. The state of the art integrated kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of storage and integrated Miele appliances and a sub-zero fridge. The principal bedroom offers a bespoke walk in dressing area and luxuriously appointed bathroom, complete with book match marble tiles and a separate bath and shower. The second double bedroom also offers built in wardrobes with access to a winter garden and a separate shower room. Residents benefit from excellent 24 hour security and concierge service, in addition to a private roof terrace, swimming pool and gym. The property has cladding, as far as we know the current position with the property is: It's been tested and there are no remedial works required.* You should make enquires about the external wall system of the property, if it has cladding and if it is safe or if there are interim measure in place.LocationThe dedicated South Bank entrance to Blackfriars Station provides excellent tube and Thameslink services to London and the rest of the south-east of England, including Gatwick and Luton Airports.Southwark Station and the Jubilee Line are also two minutes away, with services that can reach Bond Street or Canary Wharf in ten minutes.Thames riverboats connect Bankside Pier to Embankment Pier, just eight minutes away to the west, and Canary Wharf, a 15 minute trip to the east.Across the Millennium Bridge, the City of London is a short journey away, by foot or even by bicycle.Square Footage: 1,389 sq ft

Additional InfoHolding Deposit  £1,600.00 ( 1  week )Deposit Payable £9,600.00 ( 6 weeks )Minimum Term : 12 months    Rent must be paid monthly in advanceBrochuresWeb Details

description: Element Properties & Co are very proud to offer for sale a beautifully presented one bedroom property located on the top floor of a modern apartment block.Offering circa 735 sq. ft. of internal floor space, this is much larger than an average one bedroom property with a light and airy living room & modern kitchen space with integrated appliances, leading to a south facing balcony with stunning views across London.The master bedroom is spacious and equipped with fitted glass wardrobes and floor to ceiling windows.There is a spacious, modern three piece bathroom suite with floor to ceiling porcelain tiles, as well as a generously large store room, accessed via the hallway.The property also benefits from an intergrated mechanical ventilation with heat recovery system (MVHR) throughout.Further benefits include a wide parking space in an underground gated carpark, as well as lift access and plenty of communal space.The property is within close proximity of New Southgate Overground Station (0.3 miles) with access into Finsbury Park & the City as well as Arnos Grove Underground Station (0.3 miles, Piccadilly Line). There are also many bus links providing convenient access around town as well as a great selection of shops, cafes and restaurants.Arnos Park only a short stroll away from the property, a perfect spot for outdoor activities, picnics, and relaxation. The park features a beautiful lake, a playground, and plenty of open space for sports and games.The property is available from 23rd September and comes Unfurnished.
