description:
A three bedroom mid-terraced family home ideally located on the ever popular Turner Rise estate to the North of Colchester Town centre and within easy access of Colchester North Station, Town centre and A12 with allocated parking space to rear.

A three bedroom mid-terraced family home ideally located on the ever popular Turner Rise estate to the North of Colchester Town centre and within easy access of Colchester North Station, Town centre and the A12 This idyllic family home  boasts spacious living accommodation. Accommodation on the ground floor comprises of entrance hall, living room with doors leading to dining room with window to rear aspect, cloakroom and kitchen. The kitchen offers a range of base and eye level units, fitted cooker and electric hob with extractor above, sink with drainer. There is space in the kitchen for a fridge freezer and dishwasher.On the first floor you will find Three bedrooms with the main bedroom benefitting from an en-suite. There is also a further family bathroom. 
Important InformationLetting informationThe rent is exclusive of utilities and council tax.Minimum term: 12 months Deposit: £1528.84Availability: 06/11/2023No PetsNon SmokersCouncil tax band CEPC rating CHolding depositProspective applicants will be required to pay a Holding Deposit to Fenn Wright, equivalent to a maximum of 1 week's rent. Once the holding deposit has been received, Fenn Wright will suspend marketing of the rental property for a period of 15 calendar days subject to referencing commencing promptly. description:
Caplen Estates has the pleasure to present a fantastic opportunity to rent a four bedroom refurbished detached home in the heart of Lambourne End, Chigwell, which is available to rent ASAP.

The property is situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, positioned directly opposite Chigwell Row Recreational Ground and close to Grange Hill Central Line Underground Station and Shops. It is also located within close proximity to Hainault Forest Country Park, which covers a vast 280 acres for you to explore.

Upon entering the property, you are welcomed by a bright and airy reception hall with open stairs to the first floor and access to the downstairs cloakroom.  The kitchen is fully integrated with a dishwasher, fridge/freezer, oven/microwave, hob and extractor fan. The dining room overlooks the secluded rear garden, while the living room overlooks beautiful open countryside.

On the first floor, there are four well-proportioned bedrooms, one with an ensuite cloakroom as well as an additional family bathroom.  Outside, the secluded, easy to maintain garden is ready to be enjoyed all year round.

description:
A beautiful two bedroom apartment located within easy reach of Shenfield High Street, with stunning period features, offered part furnished.

This wonderful property is accessed via a secure communal entrance leading into a grand hallway, with the apartments off it.  Situated on the ground floor you walk into the hallway which takes you to a large reception room, large main bedroom, smaller second bedroom / office, fitted kitchen and modern tiled bath room with separate shower unit. This property comes with parking and a garage

The property benefits from large windows and high ceilings, which gives the apartment an incredibly light and airy feel.  Surrounded by well maintained communal gardens and the benefit of one parking space, Beech House is close to Shenfield Train Station, which now has the fully operational Elizabeth Line and Shenfield High Street, which has a vast array of shops, cafes and restaurants.  Early viewing is highly recommended. 

12 month tenancy / one weeks rent / five weeks rent deposit / first months rent in advance / EPC band D / council tax band E / property taken as seen unless negotiated otherwise

description:
Concierge > Opposite Chelmsford Train Station > Located In The City Centre > Private Balcony, Winter Garden or Terrace
City Park West offers the best of everything for the modern lifestyle, with concierge at your service, acres of green space on your doorstep and just a short walk to the station, which offers direct routes into London (just a 30 minute train journey into London Liverpool Street, with trains departing every 15 minutes). This stylish and spacious 2 bedroom apartment is available at this desirable development that's transforming the heart of Chelmsford. The apartment has a high-quality and stylish finish, making it the perfect place to unwind or to entertain. There are small luxurious touches throughout the apartment to make your living experience the most enjoyable, including heated towel rails and underfloor heating. This apartment features engineered oak flooring, white walls and triple-glazed windows which give the feeling of spaciousness and calm throughout. There is constant investment into Chelmsford, meaning that you are in strolling distance of a huge variety of eateries, bars and department stores. *Photos may be of a similar propertyTo pass Folio referencing criteria, your household will need to be earning £47,250 p/aThere are no estate or service charges incurred with this property. This property falls within Council Tax Banding D. Please allow 5 working days from the advertised available date to move-in, so any maintenance or void works can be completed. Minimum tenancy length is 12 months

description:
SUMMARY*** ZERO DEPOSIT GUARANTEE AVAILABLE ***DESCRIPTION*** ZERO DEPOSIT GUARANTEE AVAILABLE ***Connells are pleased to present to the market this stunning, modern two double bedroom apartment located in the heart of Redhill. This property is perfect for any applicants that commute via train. This property is located just 0.2 miles from Redhill mainline Train Station, making the property ideal for anyone commuting. The block also benefits from use of two lifts. From the moment you step into the contemporary foyer, Queensway exudes quality & distinctive style. The Queensway apartments have been designed & specified for luxurious living including custom fitted kitchen & stylish decor that combine to provide exceptional living space.The apartment boasts a spacious entrance hallway with a video entry phone, storage & airing cupboards one of which houses a washer/dryer, open plan lounge/diner, a custom-designed kitchen with white gloss units, laminate worktops, under counter lights, integrated oven, hob, extraction hood, fridge/freezer & dishwasher.The bathroom comprises a white bath unit with shower attachment, concealed dual flush WC & a level mixer tap set to the basin. There are two double bedrooms, the master benefits from an en-suite which comprises a shower with bi-fold door, close coupled WC & wash hand basin.Outside there is a communal roof garden for residents which is located at first-floor level providing a landscaped terrace.Further benefits include two lifts serving all apartment levels & a Sky+ facility to all apartments, double glazed windows & programmable electric panel heaters. An outstanding apartment that is ideally located in the heart of Redhill's vibrant town centre.While every reasonable effort is made to ensure the accuracy of descriptions and content, we should make you aware of the following guidance or limitations.

description:
SUMMARY*** Zero Deposit Guarantee Scheme Available ***Located on the fringes of the ever popular Park 25 development this two double bedroom first floor apartment offers a living and dining room with two Juliet balconies, modern fitted kitchen, allocated parking, master bedroom with en-suite and a second guest bedroom with two Juliet balconies.DESCRIPTION*** ZERO DEPOSIT GUARANTEE AVAILABLE ***Heating and hot water is included within the rent!We are expecting the property to be repainted prospectively finished in timeless white throughout.Located on the first floor within Approach House & set on the fringes of the ever popular Park 25 development.The lounge & dining area has space to relax & dine, perfect for throwing a dinner party. Offering usage of two Juliet balconies you can pull back the doors & let the summer breeze flow through the apartment.The luxury fitted kitchen boasts a terrific amount of storage space & being open plan to the living space you will be able to mingle with your guests whilst preparing meals.The two generous sized bedrooms allow space to move around with the additional benefit of offering a fitted wardrobe & the second bedroom with two Juliet balconies can be versatile to your needs. This room could be tailored to be utilised as an office space, second bedroom or living room depending on your needs.Bedroom one also has an en-suite shower room. This has a myriad of benefits one of which being when guests stay over they can have the pleasure of using the main bathroom. If you require storage then you will be delighted to hear that you have ample storage options throughout the apartment. With an allocated parking space and additional visitor spaces available this makes this property ideal for when friends & family come to visit. Enjoy a leisurely walk to the town centre & train station as the apartment sits within excellent proximity of both.Entrance Hallway Living & Dining Room 14' 2" x 12' 7" ( 4.32m x 3.84m )With:Two Juliet Balconies Kitchen 8' 9" x 7' 1" ( 2.67m x 2.16m )Bedroom One 15' 1" Max x 8' 6" Max ( 4.60m Max x 2.59m Max )En-Suite Shower Room 7' 7" Into Shower Cubicle x 4' 9" ( 2.31m Into Shower Cubicle x 1.45m )Bedroom Two 12' 5" Into Door Recess x 10' 5" ( 3.78m Into Door Recess x 3.17m )With:Two Juliet Balconies Bathroom 6' 7" x 6' 2" ( 2.01m x 1.88m )Outside One Allocated Parking Space Visitor Parking Spaces Communal Gardens & GroundsWhile every reasonable effort is made to ensure the accuracy of descriptions and content, we should make you aware of the following guidance or limitations.

description:
Introducing the epitome of contemporary living in an iconic Art Deco masterpiece - welcome to Du Cane Court! Nestled on the bright and breezy 6th floor, this well-presented studio flat exudes elegance and offers a lifestyle that dreams are made of.

Bathed in natural light, this gem boasts a breath-taking view that will leave you inspired. The stunning communal gardens invite you to escape the hustle and bustle of city life and find serenity amidst nature's embrace. With Du Cane Court's exclusive 24-hour concierge service at your beck and call, convenience and security are perfectly intertwined.

Let's talk location - with the Balham Northern line tube and main line station just a mere 200 metres away, your daily commute will be a breeze. Say goodbye to long and tiring journeys! Plus, the rent includes heating and hot water, ensuring your winter cocoon is warm and snug all year round.

We could go on about the undeniable charms of this art deco masterpiece, but we implore you to experience it for yourself. Call Porters Estate Agents at   to secure your exclusive viewing, and be prepared to be swept off your feet by the magic of Du Cane Court.

Your dream home awaits. Don't miss out!BrochuresFull Details

description:
The property has been recently renovated and is fresh to welcome a new family. Close to the town centre and all the local amenities. A short walks distance from Rainham train station which boasts links to multiple London Stations. 

Light an airy property throughout, ready to welcome new tenants as soon as referencing is cleared. 

Ground Floor
Hard flooring throughout this level with large bay windowed lounge, Kitchen, and access to private rear garden.

First Floor
Spacious master bedroom, second bedroom and toilet.

Second Floor
Spacious third bedroom, bathroom with bath and shower facilities, and fourth bedroom. 


Deposit required, and one months rent to be paid in advance. 

Viewings available by appointment booking only.

description: This is a very well presented three bedroom family home. Ideal location being close to Bellingham Train Station and local schools. Easy access to local shops and amenities. The property is being fully decorated throughout, with new flooring being fitted in most areas. Kitchen is nice and modern and bathroom is well presented with seperate w/c. There is a great sized low maintenance garden to the rear, a nice sized lounge area and a kitchen with lots of cupboard space. Intrnal viewing is highly recommened to appreciate this property. The property is within close distance to BELLINGHAM and BECKENHAM HILL TRAIN STATIONS as well as LOCAL SHOPS.EPC Rating: Band CCouncil Tax Band: C (Lewisham)Rent: £2,000 pcmDeposit: £2,307 (5 Week security deposit)Transport Links:The property is in a well sought after quiet residential area within short travel to stations such as Catford/Catford Bridge and Bellingham stations with links straight to London bridge and London Waterloo. Catford railway station is on the route between Blackfriars and Sevenoaks via Bromley South while Catford Bridge Railway station is on the Mid-Kent line to Hayes from Charing Cross and Cannon Street stations. As well as the railway stations there is Catford bus garage  providing many routes towards Central London and out towards Bromley & Lewisham. Situated on the A2 and A20 Catford has easy access to Kent and the popular Bluewater shopping centre.General Information:Catford's rich history has fed into the vibrant diverse town centre that it is today. The area is bordered by Downham, Forest Hill, Lewisham and Lee. Catford town centre is a busy shopping centre, with indoor and outdoor markets, selling everything from fruit and vegetables to clothing and plants. Catford is the civic heart of Lewisham borough and so is frequented by many visitors. The Broadway theatre can be found in the heart of the town centre, an important centre for cultural entertainment in south east London, pulling in international and local talent. There is a wide choice of restaurants, cafes and bars, with several featured in Time Out. The town centre is also close to Mountsfield and Ladywell parks and the Ladywell running track. Council Tax Band:  Holding Deposit: £461.00

description: NO DEPOSIT OPTION AVAILABLE FOR TENANTS - GREATER PROTECTION FOR LANDLORDS (ask for details). Set in a glorious countryside setting bordered by ancient woodlands, Abbey Barn Park is a growing new community offering a unique lifestyle on the outskirts of the sought after location, Flackwell Heath. This stunning semi-detached house boasts modern living, a high specification kitchen with Bosch fitted appliances, Allocated parking for one car and three bedrooms with one en-suite. Abbey Barn Park has a superb 34-acre country park. With woodland walks, a fitness trail, a wellness garden, play areas, allotments and a community orchard. EPC Rating: B. Council Tax Band to be confirmed as a new build. Rent excludes the tenancy deposit and any other permitted payments. Deposit payable is £2,250.00. A Holding Deposit of £450.00, based on the advertised rent, is required to reserve this property. Min Term 1 years fixed term. Please contact us for further information or visit our website.

description: A WELL PRESENTED SPLIT LEVEL ONE BEDROOM FLAT located in the BRUNSWICK TOWN AREA and close to HOVE SEAFRONT. This property comprises OPEN PLAN LOUNGE/KITCHEN with integrated appliances, MODERN FITTED BATHROOM, WEST ASPECT DOUBLE BEDROOM with ROOF TOP VIEWS TO THE SEA, EPC D.NEW ASSURED SHORTHOLD TENANCIES (ASTs) SIGNED ON OR AFTER 1 JUNE 2019Holding Deposit (per tenancy)One week's rent. This is to reserve a property. Please Note: This will be withheld if any relevant person (including any guarantor(s)) withdraw from the tenancy, fail a Right-to-Rent check or provide materially significant false or misleading information. The holding deposit will be offset against the first months rent.Security Deposit (per tenancy. Rent under £50,000 per year)Five weeks' rent. This covers damages or defaults on the part of the tenant during the tenancy.Security Deposit (per tenancy. Rent of £50,000 or over per year)Six weeks' rent. This covers damages or defaults on the part of the tenant during the tenancy.Unpaid RentInterest at 3% above the Bank of England Base Rate from Rent Due Date until paid in order to pursue non-payment of rent. Please Note: This will not be levied until the rent is more than 14 days in arrears.Lost Key(s) or other Security Device(s)Tenants are liable to the actual cost of replacing any lost key(s) or other security device(s). If the loss results in locks needing to be changed, the actual costs of a locksmith, new lock and replacement keys for the tenant, landlord any other persons requiring keys will be charged to the tenant. If extra costs are incurred there will be a charge of £15 per hour (inc. VAT) for the time taken replacing lost key(s) or other security device(s).Variation of Contract (Tenant's Request)£50 (inc. VAT) per agreed variation. To cover the costs associated with taking landlord's instructions as well as the preparation and execution of new legal documents.Change of Sharer (Tenant's Request)£50 (inc. VAT) per replacement tenant or any reasonable costs incurred if higher. To cover the costs associated with taking landlord's instructions, new tenant referencing and Right-to-Rent checks, deposit registration as well as the preparation and execution of new legal documents.Early Termination (Tenant's Request)Should the tenant wish to leave their contract early, they shall be liable to the landlord's costs in re-letting the property as well as all rent due under the tenancy until the start date of the replacement tenancy. These costs will be no more than the maximum amount of rent outstanding on the tenancy.If you have any questions on our fees, please ask a member of staff.Our Client Money Protection (CMP) scheme is with Propertymark and we are members of The Property Ombudsman.SECOND FLOOROPEN PLAN LOUNGE/KITCHENWest aspect sash window, ceiling coving, picture rail.KITCHEN AREAModern fitted kitchen comprising eye level wall cupboards and base cupboard and drawer units, Granite worktops and splashbacks, inset sink with mixer tap, electric double oven. microwave, washing machine, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, tiled floor.BATHROOMFitted with white suite.BEDROOMDouble bedroom, West aspect bay window with roof top views to the sea, ceiling coving and rose.COUNCIL TAX BAND B - £1732.83

description:
Beautifully presented family home in North Kensington
DescriptionThe property is newly renovated throughout to a high standard, with the original tiles and period features blending seamlessly with more modern touches. This fabulous family home offers a warm, bright, relaxed, private environment with a beautiful garden.The double reception room has oak flooring and a lovely bay window, whilst to the rear of the building, the modern kitchen and dining area is where the beauty of nature merges seamlessly with contemporary design. With new appliances and underfloor heating, this bright and warm space is the heart of the house and is perfect for both family meals and entertaining. There is a guest WC on the ground floor and separate utility space with a freestanding washer and dryer.From the kitchen, expansive glass doors frame the picturesque view of the beautifully landscaped, south-facing garden and provide a seamless connection from indoor to outdoor. The garden is incredibly private, peaceful and serene.With exceptionally high ceilings giving a lovely sense of volume, the first floor consists of a sizeable bedroom with a bay window and an en-suite bathroom; two additional double bedrooms which overlook the garden and a modern family bathroom and separate toilet. In the loft, there is a further double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The bedrooms offer excellent built-in storage.Barlby Road runs north off St Quintin Gardens heading towards Ladbroke Grove and is great for access to the M40, Westfield and Notting Hill. Portobello Road and Golborne Road, Little and Big Wormwood Scrubs as well as the newly renovated Kensington Memorial Park are all within easy reach.Nearby are Chepstow House, Notting Hill Prep, Bassett House, La Petite Ecole Bilingue, La Petite Ecole Francais, Pangbourne Montessori, Thomas Jones and many other excellent schools.LocationBarlby Road is located to the north of the St Quintin Conservation Area, conveniently located for Westfield and the A40 providing a fast link into and out of central London. There are lots of convenient parks including Kensington Memorial Park and the Little Scrubs park. Chepstow House, Notting Hill Prep and Bassett House schools are nearby. Ladbroke Grove Underground, Portobello Road and Golborne Road are all easily accessible from the house.Square Footage: 1,846 sq ft

description: Located on the first floor of a converted Grade II listed Georgian-style house is a well-maintained and recently refurbished one-bedroom flat. This property offers a practical design, with an open-plan living room and kitchen area, ensuring efficient use of space without unnecessary hallways or redundant areas. The kitchen is fully integrated, equipped with a dishwasher, large fridge freezer, dual-zone wine cooler, microwave, an insinkerator and extensive integrated storage. The space has a breakfast bar that divides the room.At the rear of the property is a double bedroom that provides ample storage and space for a desk. Notably, the bedroom has a direct view over gardens and is fully insulated from any road noise. The bedroom contains a large built-in ceiling-high wardrobe, an additional full height cupboard and under-bed storage, in addition to bookshelves, extra drawers and shoe cabinet.Adjacent to the bedroom is a large bathroom, equipped with a rainfall shower over the bath, an airing cupboard containing a washing machine and drying rack, a heated towel rail, and storage both below and above the basin.The entire flat is fitted with double-glazing and is available with furnishings.** HOW TO ARRANGE A VIEWING: The quickest way to enquire about this property is to register your interest via the enquiry button on this website. description: DESCRIPTION  Large 5 double bedroom period farmhouse situated in the beautiful village of Brightwell Baldwin.  This property has an abundance of features and character including a minstrels gallery overlooking the kitchen and an array of fireplaces. The well proportioned accommodation consists of a large kitchen breakfast room with open fireplace, 3 reception rooms, cloakroom and a separate utility room.  The first floor consists of a master bedroom with a dressing room and en-suite shower room and a further 2 bedrooms and family bathroom. Then on the top floor there are two bedrooms and a shower room. It has a generous part walled garden. SITUATION  Brightwell Farm is situated in the peaceful hamlet of Brightwell Baldwin which lies at the foot of the Chiltern Hills, approximately 18 miles south east of Oxford. Good local shopping facilities can be found at the nearby market towns of Watlington, Benson, Wallingford and Thame. Brightwell Baldwin is very conveniently placed being just 5 miles from J6 of the M40, providing excellent access to Central London, Heathrow and the national motorway network. There is an excellent main line rail service from Princes Risborough (11 miles) to London Marylebone (approx 45 minutes) or at Cholsey (7 miles) to London Paddington. Excellent local schools include The award winning Watlington primary school, The Oratory, Moulsford, Cranford House plus a wide choice of Oxford and Abingdon schools including The Dragon, Headington, St. Edward's and Radley. description:
This exceptional and brand new 574 sq ft / 53 sq m one bedroom apartment, set in a prime position within the Switch House East phase of the highly desirable Battersea Power Station development (next to the River Thames, Battersea Park and the upcoming Battersea Power Station Northern Line station), is available to rent through Prime London.
Finished to an incredibly high standard throughout, this apartment comprises of open-plan fully equipped and integrated kitchen and reception room, leading to substantial private terrace. The property further comprises a well-proportioned double bedroom with built in wardrobes, and a stylish en suite bathroom.
Resident facilities include a first-class 24-hour concierge, on-site gym, swimming pool, spa, cinema, games room, meeting room and a 250-square-meter roof garden designed by New York landscape firm James Corner Field Operations. 
The Battersea Power Station is a vibrant new destination for London, creating a new community of homes, shops, cafes, offices, leisure, and cultural venues, with over 19 acres of public space. The onsite Zone 1 Tube station, meanwhile, provides excellent connectivity to the rest of London, with Waterloo (7 minutes), London Bridge (10 minutes), Bank (12 minutes), and King's Cross (20 minutes) all within easy reach.BrochuresFull Details

description: BRAND NEW - JUST LAUNCHED - CONTACT US TODAYSEE WHAT YOUR NEIGHBOURS ARE SAYING"...ultimately the value of what you offer in terms of amenities, comfort, service, and style, goes above and beyond." - Kooky resident" Really can't fault the level of service and customer care we've been given while living at Kooky, they really do go above and beyond." - Kooky resident"From the second you view the apartment to the minute you move out, genuinely nothing is too much trouble for the brilliant Kooky staff - It's really next level service from Vesa and the team. This is how all rentals should be." - Kooky residentBEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED, STYLISHLY FURNISHED, AMAZING AMENITIES AND SERVICE YOU'LL TELL PEOPLE ABOUTKooky Redhill is a collection of brand-new boutique apartments in the heart of town, just a 2-minute walk from Redhill station for a quick 35-minute journey to central London. Gatwick Airport is only an 8-minute ride away - great for work or a much needed holiday.Living at Kooky is more than just an apartment - it's a lifestyle for those who dream of better. Our stylishly furnished apartments have been designed by our Kooky team, who care that you live somewhere that looks and feels amazing.We've thoughtfully designed the communal areas so you get the wow-factor of a boutique hotel that feels like home.When you move in you'll meet your dedicated Kooky Care Manager who will be on hand to help you move in and ensure everything is perfect.Our design and service are what sets us apart.AMAZING AMENITIESBeautifully designed entrance and lobbyMailrooms with postboxes & parcel lockerResidents' gym with Technogym equipmentCommunal terrace gardenCoworking space with superfast WiFiOPEN-PLAN LIVING AREAAs you enter your stylishly furnished apartment, you'll discover roomy open-plan living with kitchen, dining, and lounge spaces, as well as plenty of storage. There's ample space for whipping up a feast while your guests sit back and enjoy the sun streaming through the full-length windows and cool air breezes through the balcony doors. Close the blinds, sink into the comfy sofa, grab your drink off the coffee table and get cosy.OPEN-PLAN KITCHENCashmere handle-less doors compliment the laminate work surfaces. Fully integrated appliances complete the seamless look:  Fan oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, washer dryer and dishwasher.BEDROOMSFeel relaxed as your feet sink into the bedroom carpet and the natural light beams through the windows. The fitted wardrobes are spacious and the blackout blinds block out the light when you're laying in on the large double bed. We're happy to remove the furniture from the second bedroom should you wish to turn this space into something perfect for you.BATHROOMSThe bathrooms include rainfall showers, ready to help wake you up in the morning or refresh you after a workout. The tub is deep enough to soak in and there's also heated towel rails.KOOKY EXTRASWe genuinely care about you at Kooky and all decisions are made with you in mind.Parcel locker - for hassle-free and secure deliveries, even if you're outExperian partnership - ensuring your rental payments are considered in your credit reportingFlexible deposit options to suit youRenting with Kooky is about more than just an apartment - it's a lifestyle for those who dream of more. Book your viewing today.

description: This stunning two-bedroom ground floor maisonette has been recently re-decorated and is well-presented throughout. Comprising a spacious reception room at the front with feature fire place, modern eat-in kitchen with underfloor heating leading out to a sunny private garden, two good sized double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a smart shower room. The property further benefits from under stair storage and a separate cupboard to house the washing machine and separate dryer. Situated on a pretty tree lined street in the highly sought after Diamond Conservation Area with the shops, cafés and restaurants of Queenstown road and Lavender Hill on your doorstep and the green open spaces of Clapham Common just a short walk away. Transport links are excellent with frequent trains running to Waterloo from Queenstown road station and Victoria from Battersea Park station. There are also frequent buses running over the river into central London in one direction and into Clapham in the other.  BrochuresParticulars

description: This attractive semi detached three bedroom house close to West Ham station has large rooms, modern décor and a private garden. Available to let to one household for a 12 month tenancy, it’s all ready to move into.IF YOU LIVED HEREYou’d have plenty of space to spread out with generously sized rooms and simple modern décor. There’s also a paved front yard and a back garden with side access.The entrance porch provides welcome shelter to the front door and opens into the hallway. From here there’s a huge open plan main living space to your left and, straight ahead, a spacious kitchen that’s over 20 ft long and has a door to the paved garden. Also on this floor is one of the three bedrooms, accessed via a door from the kitchen, and with great garden views.At over 22 ft long, the open plan living room has space for lounge and dining areas, and lots of natural light from a large south-facing window. The adjacent kitchen has extensive fitted wall and floor cabinets with a combination of integrated and freestanding appliances, and a large amount of worktop space. Smart white and blue wall tiles complement the honey-hued kitchen cupboards, and a window and glazed door provide garden views and access to the terrace.The approximately 15 metre long garden is an all-season space, with paving throughout, raised beds in the middle, and a specimen tree and shed at the end.The first floor is home to the main double bedroom, the second bedroom and the bathroom. The main bedroom is a large approximately square room that’s flooded with natural light from two south-facing windows, including a large bay. There’s a large alcove that can house two wardrobes, with space left over for a dressing table, desk and chair, in addition to a large double bed and bedside tables.  The second bedroom has a full-height built-in wardrobe, space for additional bedroom furniture, and a picture window with leafy garden views.The bathroom is a fresh and light-filled space with white wall tiles, marbled floor tiles, and a contemporary suite that comprises a shower cubicle, washbasin console and WC.  The property has been refurbished throughout, and has double glazed windows with leaded lights, simple all-white décor, and wood laminate flooring. It also has gas central heating.WHAT ELSE?-You’ll be ideally located close to local shops and within easy walking distance of the neighbourhood amenities of West Ham and Plaistow, including the stations and plentiful green spaces. There are numerous leisure and entertainment options locally and even more in nearby Stratford, including Westfield Shopping centre. -There’s great access to a range of green spaces, with the playing fields of Memorial Park on your doorstep and lovely West Ham Park within a mile. The wide open spaces and world class sports facilities of the Olympic Park are just over a mile away.-Transport connections are excellent. It’s a mere four minute walk to West Ham station which is on the Jubilee, Hammersmith & City and District Lines, the DLR and c2c rail, giving plenty of options for fast direct journeys to Canary Wharf (4 min), the City (11 min to Fenchurch Street and 18 min to Liverpool Street), the West End, and City Airport (11 min). And the super-connected east London transport hub of Stratford is just one stop away.BrochuresHolland Road, West HamBrochure

description: Two bedroom apartment located on the third floor of this sought after development close to town and station with allocated under croft parking. Two bedrooms master with en suite, modern kitchen and bathroom. Available 25th September. EPC Rating C (71) Tenancy fees do not apply unless you are a registered company. We require a holding deposit equivalent to 1 weeks agreed rent to reserve the property. On successful passing of credit checks 1 months rent (less holding deposit) and a damages deposit equivalent to 5 weeks agreed rent is required. Monthly rent will be payable per calendar month in advance. Please see website for full tenancy information.Hitchin is a charming medieval market town and has many fine Tudor and Georgian buildings, particularly around the market square. Near to the market square stands the large medieval parish church of St Mary. The town provides good shopping as well as a swimming pool, football team, two theatres, a wide variety of restaurants and pubs and highly regarded girls and boys schools. There is also a mainline railway station providing direct access to Kings Cross and Cambridge.

description: BRAND NEW - JUST LAUNCHED - CONTACT US TODAYSEE WHAT YOUR NEIGHBOURS ARE SAYING"...ultimately the value of what you offer in terms of amenities, comfort, service, and style, goes above and beyond." - Kooky resident" Really can't fault the level of service and customer care we've been given while living at Kooky, they really do go above and beyond." - Kooky resident"From the second you view the apartment to the minute you move out, genuinely nothing is too much trouble for the brilliant Kooky staff - It's really next level service from Vesa and the team. This is how all rentals should be." - Kooky residentBEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED, STYLISHLY FURNISHED, AMAZING AMENITIES AND SERVICE YOU'LL TELL PEOPLE ABOUTKooky Redhill is a collection of brand-new boutique apartments in the heart of town, just a 2-minute walk from Redhill station for a quick 35-minute journey to central London. Gatwick Airport is only an 8-minute ride away - great for work or a much needed holiday.Living at Kooky is more than just an apartment - it's a lifestyle for those who dream of better. Our stylishly furnished apartments have been designed by our Kooky team, who care that you live somewhere that looks and feels amazing.We've thoughtfully designed the communal areas so you get the wow-factor of a boutique hotel that feels like home.When you move in you'll meet your dedicated Kooky Care Manager who will be on hand to help you move in and ensure everything is perfect.Our design and service are what sets us apart.AMAZING AMENITIESBeautifully designed entrance and lobbyMailrooms with postboxes & parcel lockerResidents' gym with Technogym equipmentCommunal terrace gardenCoworking space with superfast WiFiOPEN-PLAN LIVING AREAAs you enter your stylishly furnished apartment, you'll discover roomy open-plan living with kitchen, dining, and lounge spaces, as well as plenty of storage. There's ample space for whipping up a feast while your guests sit back and enjoy the sun streaming through the full-length windows and cool air breezes through the balcony doors. Close the blinds, sink into the comfy sofa, grab your drink off the coffee table and get cosy.OPEN-PLAN KITCHENCashmere handle-less doors compliment the laminate work surfaces. Fully integrated appliances complete the seamless look:  Fan oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, washer dryer and dishwasher.BEDROOMFeel relaxed as your feet sink into the bedroom carpet and the natural light beams through the windows. The fitted wardrobes are spacious and the blackout blinds block out the light when you're laying in on the large double bed.BATHROOMThe bathroom includes a rainfall shower, ready to help wake you up in the morning or refresh you after a workout. The tub is deep enough to soak in and there's also heated towel rails.KOOKY EXTRASWe genuinely care about you at Kooky and all decisions are made with you in mind.Parcel locker - for hassle-free and secure deliveries, even if you're outExperian partnership - ensuring your rental payments are considered in your credit reportingFlexible deposit options to suit youRenting with Kooky is about more than just an apartment - it's a lifestyle for those who dream of more. Book your viewing today.

description:
A bright and spacious 2 double bedroom, 2 bathroom, flat to let at the rear of the raised ground floor in this beautifully presented property located on Inverness Terrace. The lounge comes with a leather sofa and dining table. It has a newly refurbished, separate kitchen with brand new appliances: an AEG washer dryer, Bosh hobs & oven and dishwasher, overhead extractor, and a fridge freezer and benefits from granite worktops. The property also offers lots of storage and is in excellent decorative order throughout.

The flat is on sought-after tree-lined Inverness Terrace, just minutes from Queensway (Central line) and Bayswater (Circle & District lines) stations. Situated in the heart of Bayswater with easy access to all of Queensway`s shops, restaurants and bars, Waitrose supermarket and the Porchester Centre with its gym, swimming pool and library. It also has the open green spaces of Hyde Park less than 1 minute's walk away. 

Council Tax band - E, EPC - C

Suitable for professionals only

Available NOW

description: A spacious modern four bedroom link detached family home that has recently been renovated throughout, which benefits from off street parking and a single garage. Located in Henley town centre, within a short walk of the train station, River Terrace and all local amenities. AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 2023.ACCOMMODATION:Kitchen - Matching eye and base level units, built in oven and microwave with ceramic hob, fridge/freezer, and an under counter dishwasher.Dining Area - Space for a large dining table and chairs.Utility Cupboard - Housing the freestanding washing machine and tumble dryer.Living Room - Open plan room with double French doors out to the rear garden.Shower Room - Shower cubicle, W.C, wash hand basin and a heated towel rail.Master Bedroom - Good size double bedroom with fitted wardrobes/cupboards.Second Bedroom - Double bedroom with a fitted wardrobe/cupboard.Third Bedroom - Double bedroom.Fourth Bedroom - Double bedroom.Bathroom - Bath with shower attachment over, W.C, wash hand basin and a heated towel rail.Outside:Front Garden - Driveway parking for several vehicles and with access into the garage.Rear Garden - Delightful enclosed low maintenance courtyard style rear garden with rear access via the garage.Garage - With an electric roller shutter door.PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL PROPERTIES ARE TAKEN AS SEEN AND NO ALTERATIONS, ADDITIONS OR CLEANING WILL BE UNDERTAKEN BY THE LANDLORD UNLESS SPECIFICALLY AGREED AT THE TIME OF OFFER.Local Authority: South Oxfordshire District Council.  Furnishings: This property is to be let on an unfurnished basis.Rent: Rent payable in advance exclusive of Council Tax and all connected utilities.Holding Deposit: A deposit equivalent to one week’s rent is required to secure the property (subject to contract and receipt of satisfactory references).  The property will be withdrawn from the market once the holding deposit has cleared in the Ballards bank account.  This is non-refundable in the event of unsatisfactory references, false or misleading information was provided or the withdrawal of your offer.Dilapidations Deposit: A deposit equivalent to five weeks’ rent will be required to be held throughout the Tenancy as security against damages or any breach of the agreement by the Tenant. The dilapidations deposit will be registered with an approved deposit protection scheme (unless the contract is a Non-Assured Shorthold Tenancy Agreement).Fees and Charges: Other fees and charges may apply if the Tenant breaches any of the clauses contained within the official Tenancy documents, details of which can be found on the Ballards website – References: We will require at least two of the following references – Employers, accountant, financial, credit or Landlord.  The credit check will be collected via an outside agency and therefore the necessary personal details/information will be supplied to them as part of the credit referencing process.Pets: If you wish to keep a pet at a property then you must declare this in the first instance, as you will need to obtain the Landlords consent in writing via the Agent, prior to the commencement of the Tenancy.Membership Names and Numbers:Tenancy Deposit Scheme Membership Number – G02899The Property Ombudsman Membership Number – D03311Safeagent Licence Number – A2716Due to new regulations, Ballards are now required to obtain proof of identity for each Tenant who rents a property via our agency.  For this purpose, we are required to hold a copy of Photocard Driving Licence, Passport, and current utility bill.  We may also require proof of permission to reside in the UK.Important Note: For clarification, we wish to inform all applicants that we have not carried out a detailed survey, nor tested the services, appliances and specific fittings.  Room sizes should not be relied upon for furnishings and no responsibility is taken for any error, omission or mis-statement in any of the marketing material for the property.LocationLocated just a short walk from the vibrant town centre of Henley-on-Thames which offers a range of shopping facilities including Waitrose/Sainsburys supermarkets, three screen cinema, theatre, library, excellent doctors surgery and a host of restaurants, cafes and pubs/bars. In addition, there are several recreational facilities many associated with the River Thames. There are a wide choice of both state and private schools including Badgemore Primary, Gillotts Senior School, Shiplake College, Queen Anne’s and Rupert House. The commuter is well provided for Henley Station having direct links with London Paddington and the M4/M40 J8/9 and 4 are nine miles giving access to London, Heathrow, West Country and the Midlands.DirectionsFrom Ballards office on Hart Street, proceed to the central traffic lights and continue through the Market Place towards the Town Hall.  Proceed up Gravel Hill passing the Town Hall and Hop Gardens on the right hand side. Take the second turning on the left hand side into Ancastle Green, bear right at the 'communal green' and the property can be found after a short distance on the left hand side.

description:
Luxury one bedroom apartment in the Landmark Place development located by Tower Bridge and The City of London.

This one bedroom apartment comprises of a spacious double bedroom with built in storage, high end integrated kitchen appliances, open plan reception room and a private balcony.

The building includes 24-hour concierge, resident's gym, swimming pool, spa facilities, library, cinema, business suit and 24-hour concierge.

Over-looking Lower Thames Street, the closest underground stations are Tower Hill (Circle and District Line), Tower Gateway (DLR) and Monument (Northern, Circle & District line), as well as the Thames Clipper service at Tower Pier. London Bridge station is a short and pleasant walk over the bridge itself.

The Sugar Quay Riversides closest underground stations are Tower Hill (Circle and District Line), Tower Gateway (DLR) and Monument (Northern, Circle & District line), as well as the Thames Clipper service at Tower Pier along with London Bridge station being a short walk over the bridge itself.

description: A beautiful and very well presented first floor period conversion situated within this imposing semi detached house. This property will be refreshed through out and ready for lucky individual with wonderful  benefits from excellent living space, great transport links and off street parking. Furthermore, the property is conveniently placed to numerous local amenities such as coffee bars, restaurants, retail outlets, Odeon cinema or The Ritzy Picture House, and the award wining "Hideaway" jazz bar & restaurant. Nearest transport connections can be found at Streatham Hill Mainline with links to London Victoria.   Ideally suited to a single or professional couple this thoughtfully presented property comprises on the first floor, spacious living room with engineered wood flooring and ornamental period fireplace, steps down to a fitted kitchen with breakfast area, large double bedroom with built in closest, bathroom suite, high ceilings throughout. TRAIN: Streatham Hill Mainline [Links to London Victoria] BUS: Direct links to The City and The West End.ROAD - A23 & A205 South Circular AIRPORTS - Gatwick approx. 25 miles -  Heathrow approx. 26 miles       This property is available with a Deposit Free option which means that instead of paying a traditional five weeks security deposit, you pay a fee of one weeks rent + VAT to become a member of a deposit free renting scheme which significantly reduces the up-front costs. This fee is non-refundable and is not a deposit so cannot be used towards covering the cost of any future damage.

description: New build, interior designed one double bedroom apartment of over 680sqft with south-west facing balcony situated on the 6th floor of this sought after brand new development next to Finsbury Park station.The apartment is finished to a high specification with an  interior design including 'Versace' wallpaper and high quality furnishings.  Boasting bright interiors with West facing views the apartment comprises of a good sized open plan reception room, stylish contemporary kitchen with integral Bosch appliances and a breakfast bar plus space for dining, double sized bedroom with fitted wardrobe, high quality and contemporary bathroom suite, ample storage and a private balcony.  Further benefits include floor to ceiling windows, part engineered timber flooring with underfloor heating and carpet in bedroom.  This brand new development benefits from 24 hour concierge, lift in building, bicycle storage, communal gardens and resident-only Wifi lounge.Located just moments from Finsbury Park, offering transport links into the City and Central London via the Piccadilly & Victoria lines, as well as National rail services.  The apartment surrounds an array of amenities and is situated within easy reach of the open spaces at Finsbury Park.Our China Desk is here for you, if Chinese is your preferred language, please get in touch via WeChat (ChestertonsChinaDesk)BrochuresSuper-size images and Full Online Details ---

description: Property Reference: 11685   A one bedroom apartment situated in the highly sought after E1 postcode of East London.  The apartment offers an open plan kitchen and spacious living area, one generously proportioned double bedroom and one family bathroom. The apartment benefits from laminate flooring and a secure entrance intercom. Situated in an enviable location with easy access to public transport links and central London amenities. Shawell Station, Tower Hill Station and Wapping Station are all within easy walking distance. Surrounded by a vast choice of amenities including St Katherine Docks and the brilliant Tobacco Dock event space. For a break away from city life there are plenty of green spaces nearby, including the beautiful King Edward Memorial Park just 10 minutes walk away.  Deposit is £1,961 which is equivalent to 5 weeks rent.  Sorry, No Pets, No Children, No Sharers, No Smokers.  Students Welcome. The rent includes all bills with the exception of a tv licence which the tenant will be responsible for.  Furniture included: Double bed and mattress  RELEVANT LETTING FEES AND TENANT PROTECTIONAs well as paying the rent, you may also be required to make the following permitted payments. Permitted payments Before the tenancy starts payable to Charles David Casson 'the Agent') - Holding Deposit: 1 week's rent - Deposit: 5 weeks' rent - 1 Months rent During the tenancy (payable to the Agent) - Payment of up to £50 or (reasonable costs incurred if higher) if you want to change the tenancy agreement - Payment of interest for the late payment of rent at a rate of 3% above the Bank of England base rate at the time of the arrears - Payment for the reasonably incurred costs for the loss of keys/security devices - Payment of any unpaid rent or other reasonable costs associated with your early termination of the tenancy Where any pets are agreed with the landlord the rental price advertised may be increased by an agreed amount. description: SHOWER EN-SUITE, DRIVEWAY FOR 2/3 CARS, SOLAR PANELS, POPULAR AND QUIET ESTATE, GROUND FLOOR WC, 1.6 MILES TO A249! Accommodation: This spacious four bedroom detached house is the ideal family home with generous room sizes throughout and convenient features. On the ground floor, you have two reception rooms, a practical kitchen with ample work space and a wc that is ideal when having friends over or for a busy family household. Upstairs are the four bedrooms, the master has built in wardrobe space and a shower en-suite as well as you have another two double bedrooms. The family bathroom is located in the middle of the first floor and has a shower over bath.  Outside Space: The property benefits from a driveway for at least two cars as well as a garage that can be used for additional parking or storage. The property has two side access points that lead through to the rear garden, this is great space with patio, laid to lawn area and raised decked area with BBQ.  Local Information: Penny Cress Road is very well located, being on a quiet and low traffic estate you have the perfect home to raise your family. You'll be just a stone's throw away from the award winning Minster Leas Beach and close to some great schools for all ages including the Oasis Academy. For transport your closest train station is Sheerness and you can take advantage of the A249 which is 1.6 miles away and leads to neighbouring towns as well as the M2/M20.  The successful applicant must have a provable household income of £51,000 or above Be quick to enquire for this property, viewings can be arranged by calling Family Homes on   Council Tax: D Deposit: £1,961 **Pets Considered**

This family home has a great living space with a large and spacious reception room and an open-plan kitchen and dining room with under floor heating leading to the private garden. On the first floor, there are three bright double bedrooms, one en-suite bathroom, and a family bathroom with a separate toilet. The top floor provides a further double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The garden backs onto the West London Bowling Club, creating a wonderfully open aspect to the house's rear, further enhancing the sense of space and light. Barlby Road is located in North Kensington, within easy reach of Portobello Road and Golborne Road.

description:
8 Water Street is a new low-rise, pet-friendly building with an expansive roof terrace, private balconies and social spaces.
DescriptionForming part of Canary Wharf’s new district Wood Wharf, 8 Water Street is home to 174 low-rise, pet-friendly apartments.   Enjoying access to a landscaped garden overlooking South Dock and the quiet boardwalks and floating pavilions of Water Square.  It also boasts an expansive roof terrace, amenities also include Reception, Residents Lounge, Multi-Function Room, Private Dining and Communal Garden.  HD smart TV, Virgin Media high speed Broadband included, Siemens appliances throughout, washer/dryer. Fitted wardrobes, heated flooring in bathroom, with comfort cooling and heating.   ***THIRD SPACE GYM MEMBERSHIP INCLUDED***  Located in the heart of Canada Square, Third Space Canary Wharf is Europe’s largest luxury health club with more than 100,000 square feet of world class training space spread across 3 floors.    Call for full availability on Studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments.  *Photos being for illustrative purposes only and may vary*LocationOne of the safest and most secure estate in London with superb connectivity and so much more than a financial centre with 5 shopping malls, an array of fine restaurants, bars and a programme of arts and events.     8 Water Street is served by nearby excellent transport connections, with Canary Wharf station located a short walk away, offering services into central London in under 20 minutes. There are also convenient connections to London City Airport.Square Footage: 412 sq ft

It is a place where you can enjoy city views over the City of London and experience the absolute best of international culture, entertainment, retail, and the Westminster hub.The newly opened Nine Elms tube station and Vauxhall tube and mainline station are moments away from the development to take you around London. You may also choose the Thames Clipper service down the river and enjoy the city life. Regent Property comply with the Tenant Fees Act 2019 and are members of The Property Ombudsman scheme. description:
NO DEPOSIT OPTION AVAILABLE The Mandalay Court development stands well back from the road, looking out majestically over Withdean Park. This apartment has well-proportioned rooms and naturally lit through their wide picture windows, and these are double glazed to ensure complete tranquility. From here you are just a short walk from Preston Park Station, and a two minute drive from the A23, so this flat would suit commuters, so it is sure to be popular with many.
Style: Purpose built apartment with a liftBedrooms: 2 doubleLiving rooms: 1 with park viewsLocation: WithdeanThe Mandalay Court development stands well back from the road, looking out majestically over Withdean Park. This apartment has well-proportioned rooms and naturally lit through their wide picture windows, and these are double glazed to ensure complete tranquility. From here you are just a short walk from Preston Park Station, and a two minute drive from the A23, so this flat would suit commuters, so it is sure to be popular with many.From the wide and welcoming hallway you have the generous living room which has soft latte carpets and buttermilk walls, and this clean palette can be found throughout for continuity. This room has delightful verdant views across Withdean Park which is a delight as the trees change throughout the seasons, and there's ample space in here for comfortable sofas and a dining table, although you can eat within the kitchen too. This is nicely separate with white units a cooker and a fridge leaving space for a washing machine, and you can look out over the vista as you wash up. Both bedrooms are double with space for freestanding wardrobes, and the bathroom is fresh in white with a shower over the bath.This attractive flat is beautifully situated in a popular area with lots of local shops and green spaces. The city centre shopping districts and the beach are within easy reach, and this spacious apartment also offers easy access to the A23 as well as the train station with its regular, fast links to the airports and London.

description: Please quote reference 47311 when enquiring about this propertyA beautifully refurbished 4 bed detached house located in a historic market town Saffron Walden. It is 2 miles to Audley End train station. Intersection to the M11 motorway is about 4 miles from town. Total floor area of the property is 96.43 sq meters (1037 sq feet). The accommodation comprises: Gas central heating, all double glazed windows, garden and parking. DOWNSTAIRS - An ensuite (5.8m x 2.45m) with radiator, windows and carpeted floor, The bathroom has shower, w.c., washbasin with storage, window, boiler and laminated flooring. - An entrance lobby with archway to living room (6.15m x 3.5m) with radiator and woodflooring. A French door leading to dining room. Staircase to first floor. - Dining room (3.5m x 2.8m) with radiator, patio door and woodflooring. Kitchen (3.1m x 3.1m) with storage room (1.6m x 0,85m), door to back garden, table with storage underneath and wood flooring, recently fitted kitchen with gas cooker and overhead extractor. New white goods provided: fridge freezer, built-in electric oven and washer/dryer. UPSTAIRS - Landing - Big master bedroom (2.95m x 6m) with 2 radiators. - 2nd bedroom (3m x 3m) with radiator and wardrobe. - 3rd bedroom (3m x 3m) with built in airing cupboard, radiator and wardrobe. - Bathroom (1.73m x 2m) with window, tiled walls throughout, radiator, washbasin (with storage), w.c., shower and laminate wood flooring. description: DRAFT PARTICULARS - awaiting verification from the Landlord**RETIREMENT APARTMENT FOR THOSE AGED 60 OR OVER**Churchill Sales & Lettings are delighted to be marketing this lovely two bedroom, two bathroom ground floor apartment with Juliet Balcony  overlooking the communal garden. The property offers deceptively spacious accommodation throughout and is presented in good order. The Lounge offers ample space for living and dining room furniture and has a feature electric fireplace with attractive surround.  A door opens onto the Juliet Balcony. The Kitchen is accessed via the Lounge and offers a range of eye and base level units with working surfaces over and tiled splashbacks. There is a built in waist height oven, 4 ring electric hob with extractor hood over, a fridge, a frost-free freezer and washer/dryer. A window allows for light and ventilation. Bedroom One is a generous double room with a useful walk-in wardrobe, a storage cupboard and plenty of space for additional bedroom furniture if required. The En-Suite Shower Room offers a large shower cubicle with handrail, heated towel rail, a WC and wash hand basin with vanity unit beneath. Bedroom Two is another good size room with a built in mirror wardrobe and could be used as a separate Dining Room, Study or Hobby Room.  The Shower Room offers a large shower cubicle with handrail, heated towel rail, a WC and wash hand basin with vanity unit beneath. Perfectly complementing this wonderful apartment are two further storage cupboards located in the hallway.Sanderson Lodge is a charming development of 37 one and two-bedroom retirement apartments with a beautiful secluded garden.  Sanderson Lodge is located in the heart of Selsdon, close to the bustling High Street which has a wide range of retailers, a variety of restaurants and coffee shops, a large supermarket, a Library and Selsdon Hall which is a hub for the local community.Selsdon is a vibrant, leafy suburb located in Surrey.  Selsdon Wood Nature Reserve is open to the public and is a National Trust site, fondly known as ‘The Bird Sanctuary’, due to its many varieties of bird inhabitants and is a popular place for a gentle stroll.Regular buses service Selsdon and the surrounding areas with the Freedom Pass allowing free travel to explore all that London has to offer.  The train from Sanderstead main railway station provides direct trains to London Victoria.The Lodge manager is on hand throughout the day to support the Owners and keep the development in perfect shape as well as arranging many regular events in the Owners’ Lounge from coffee mornings to games afternoons.  A Guest Suite is available for your friends and family to stay in.  In addition, you are entitled to use of the Guest Suites at all Churchill Retirement Living developments across the country.  Prices are available from the Lodge Manager.Sanderson Lodge has been designed with safety and security at the forefront, the apartment has an emergency Careline system installed, monitored by the onsite Lodge Manager during the day and 24 hours, 365 days a year by the Careline team. A Careline integrated intruder alarm, secure video entry system and sophisticated fire and smoke detection systems throughout both the apartment and communal areas provide unrivalled peace of mind. Sanderson Lodge is managed by the award winning Churchill Estates Management, working closely with Churchill Retirement Living and Churchill Sales and Lettings to maintain the highest standards of maintenance and service for every lodge and owner. Sanderson Lodge requires at least one apartment Owner to be over the age of 60 with any second Owner over the age of 55.Council Tax Band EPlease check regarding Pets with Churchill Estates ManagementService charges include: Careline system, buildings insurance, water and sewerage rates, Ground Source Heating, communal cleaning, utilities and maintenance, garden maintenance, lift maintenance, lodge manager and a contribution to the contingency fund.Security DepositA security deposit equal to 5 week’s rent will be payable at the start of the tenancy. This covers damages or defaults on the part of the tenant during the tenancy. It will be reimbursed at the end of the tenancy subject to the details of the agreement and the findings of the inventory check out report.  Holding DepositA holding deposit equal to 1 weeks rent will be payable on acceptance of an application. This will be held and used towards the first months rentPlease note: The holding deposit will be withheld if the applicant(s) or any relevant person (including any guarantor(s)) withdraw from the tenancy, fail a Right-to-Rent check, provide materially significant false or misleading information, or fail to sign their tenancy agreement (and / or Deed of Guarantee) within 30 days (or other deadline as mutually agreed in writing).BrochuresSanderson Lodge, SelsdonBrochure

description: Occupying living accommodation of approx. 1180.sq.ft with a neutral finish throughout.Broadwater Road is one of a collection of streets within a sought-after residential pocket of Tottenham off Bruce Grove. An assortment of attractive period homes lines quiet residential streets near the 8 hectares of parkland which surrounds the 16th Century Castle at Bruce Castle Park.The local social scene in Tottenham really is on the up with an emergence of gastropubs, bars, and cool coffee shops, catering for increasing demand from young professionals that have chosen to make Tottenham their home in recent years.For transport links, you will be spoilt for choice, having close access to  Seven Sisters, Tottenham Hale (Stansted Express Link) and Bruce Grove (20 mins to Liverpool Street) while buses from the nearby High Road can take you into Islington, Hackney and Central London. description: This wonderful home is available for immediate let. Set in Trumpington, the location is very convenient for easy access to the centre of Cambridge.Accommodation is set over three floors. One of the most impressive features of this property is the modern fitted kitchen. This space boasts sleek gloss white and wood finish handleless units, laminate worktop and a single bowl sink featuring a square chrome mixer tap. This kitchen is fully equipped with a range of energy-efficient integrated appliances, including a dishwasher, fridge/freezer, integrated stainless steel oven, 4-ring stainless steel hob, and washing machine. The ceramic floor tiles not only add a touch of luxury but also offer durability. In addition to the luxury fitted kitchen, the bathrooms have also been fitted to a modern specification. The bathrooms are fitted with white sanitaryware with chrome accessories.A white bath with a wood effect bath panel is complemented by a concealed thermostatic shower and glass screen. En suites feature a separate glass cubicle with a sliding door. The white back-to-wall toilet with concealed dual flush cistern enhances the bathroom's seamless look. Finishing touches to the bathrooms include heated towel rails and a shaver points.The interiors are contemporary aesthetic. Internal doors are painted white, complemented by chrome door furniture. Windows and French doors are finished in power-coated aluminum in a dark grey exterior and white interior.The master bedroom features mirrored glass and timber wardrobe doors with an oak surround. Outside, the property has the benefit of a carport featuring secure, fully automated gates with a manual override. Additionally, allocated paved parking areas are available.The landscaped front garden and turfed rear garden provides plenty of outdoor space. EPC - BAvailable immediately To enquire, please click the 'Contact Agent' button and send us an email enquiry. We will respond to you with an email directing you to our registration form. Please ensure you have registered with us before calling to book a viewing, we are only able to book viewings with fully registered applicants.

description: Spread over three floors, this beautiful home is filled with natural light and offers the perfect space for everyday family living. The ground floor comprises a large open-plan reception/ dining room, which provides direct access to the garden area. The kitchen has been fitted with modern units and appliances. There is also a utility room, office and a conservatory. There are four bedrooms on the first floor, two with an en suite bathroom, one with a dressing room and the others with a family bathroom to share. The second floor comprises three bedrooms and a family bathroom. There is also direct access to a lovely roof terrace and access to eave storage. The property also benefits from a garage and off street parking. Available to rent through Knight Frank on an unfurnished basis. EPC D.Dover Park Drive is a remarkably peaceful and exclusive neighbourhood in an idyllic part of South West London. It is surrounded by green open space, with Putney Heath, Wimbledon Common and Richmond Park all within walking distance.  The location offers easy access to the many and varied shops, restaurants, gastropubs and transport links of Roehampton, Putney, Barnes and Wimbledon. It is also ideally situated for commuting to excellent local schools.BrochuresMore Details

key_features: ['0.3 MILES TO SYDENHAM OVERGROUND STATION', 'WOODEN FLOORING THROUGHOUT', 'SEMI-DETACHED HOME', 'NEWLY REFURBISHED', 'TWO RECEPTION ROOMS', 'UNFURNISHED']
description: **NO HMO**  SUBSTANTIAL 1930'S SEMI DETACHED FAMILY HOME NOW AVAILABLE TO RENT : GENUINE FOUR DOUBLE BEDROOMS : THREE BATHROOMS : TWO RECEPTION ROOMS : CONSERVATORY : WOODEN FLOORING THROUGHOUT : LOCATED ON ONE OF SYDENHAM'S MOST SOUGHT AFTER ROADS SET WITHIN THE HEART OF TOWN : 0.3 MILES TO SYDENHAM OVERGROUND STATION : AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER : UNFURNISHEDLooking for an exceptional 4 bedroom family home? Look no further!Large and spacious family home. The accommodation comprises; Front reception, rear reception, conservatory, large kitchen/diner, four bedrooms, WC and bathroom. The property further benefits from a very large boarded loft. To the rear there is a delightful mature garden with a westerly aspect and private outlook. With Sydenham High Street only moments away and Sydenham station with excellent links to London Bridge and also the East London line.Location:General information:Less than 200 years ago Sydenham was a sleepy hamlet in the Kent countryside. All changed in 1852 when the Directors of the Railway company had the bright idea of buying and moving the Crystal Palace built by St Joseph Paxton for the Great Exhibition in 1851 from Hyde Park to Sydenham. Their idea was to encourage Londoners to take a day out 'in the country' to visit the new enlarged Crystal Palace set in its own pleasure gardens complete with pools, fountains and even a Dinosaur Theme Park. A sort of combination of Disneyland and Jurassic Park!This transformed Sydenham into a fashionable Victorian town for Londoners to visit which inevitably grew and merged to now make Sydenham an integral multi-ethnic part of South East London. The FA Cup was played here, Colour TV was invented here, the first pneumatic railway ran through Sydenham and many famous & notorious people have made it their homeIn 1871 Sydenham was imortalised in the works of the exiled Camille Pissaro - the most famous of which, a view along Lawrie Park Avenue towards St Bart's Church, now hangs in the National Gallery. Other famous residents of Sydenham have included Ernest Shackleton, the Antartic explorer, Sir George Groves, compiler of the musical dictionary, and W G Grace, England's greatest cricketer.Sydenham station has recently opened the East London tube line extension that connects Sydenham to Surrey Quays and IslingtonMin. Tenancy Lenght : 12 months Council Tax Band : E Council Tax Band: E Holding Deposit: £600.00

description: This delightful two bedroom terraced home in a quiet corner of a coveted residential area has been refurbished from top to bottom to offer a modern, comfortable and greener family friendly space.The entrance hall leads to a newly fitted kitchen equipped with dishwasher, microwave and integrated fridge freezer. A separate living and dining room comes with a smart TV, dining for four people and wooden flooring throughout. The living space opens out to a secure, pet friendly garden with outdoor dining. Upstairs, two bedrooms - one double and one zip and link which can be arranged as a double or twin - and a bathroom with a shower over bath provide plenty of space for family living.With hot water and heating delivered by renewable energy, this eco-friendly home is fitted with an air source heat pump which is powered by solar panels and a battery.Situated just a 10 minute walk from Goldsworth Park and Lake boasting picturesque walks and outdoor play areas, and a 9 minute walk from Goldsworth Park Centre with a large Waitrose, Post Office and many other amenities. This home also benefits from being close to Goldsworth Primary School and is a 9 minute drive from Woking town centre which has direct train links into London.Front Exterior - Living Room - Dining Area - Kitchen - Landing - Master Bedroom - Bedroom 2 - Family Bathroom - Garden - BrochuresWestmead, Woking

description: Ready to move into - Register your interest now! What does renting at Cortland Cassiobury offer? Surrounded by award-winning parks & gardens and boasting plenty of outdoor space of its own, Cortland Cassiobury provides exceptional and unparalleled apartment living.  Our brand-new rental apartments are well-connected - a short drive from the motorway and walking distance of Watford station, making your commute quick and easy. Choose to make one of our apartments your new home, offering beautiful and practical spaces, custom designed for you to enjoy. Many also benefit from private balconies and far-reaching views. With designer finishes like natural stone worktops, modern soft close cabinetry and Elfa storage solutions. Every detail has been considered from the chrome light fittings down to built-in USB sockets. Our apartments brighten your everyday - from the moment you wake up to the minute you come home.Our outstanding amenities provide you with plenty to do, indoors and out - a cinema room, club lounge, flexible workspace and fitness centre (with Virtual Fitness from Wexer) are complemented by extensive, landscaped gardens with BBQs, an outdoor cinema and even a dog park - all included in your rent! Challenge your mates to a bocce ball tournament or table tennis match, or simply get to know your neighbours at one of our exclusive resident events. Our state-of-the-art fitness centre offers residents the perfect workout without having to travel. So, cancel your expensive monthly gym membership!Whatever your day looks like, you'll come home to a level of service and resident-focused hospitality that redefine rental apartment living!Key FeaturesBrand-new apartments with outstanding interiors, and exclusive amenitiesSpace to work - flexible co-working spacePlaces to relax - fitness centre, landscaped gardens, outdoor cinema and BBQs, club lounge, media suiteLight and airy open plan living, dining and kitchen areasHi-spec, fully-integrated kitchen with state-of-the-art Samsung appliancesStylish bathroom suites with deluxe fixtures and fittings Double bedrooms with ample storage spacePrivate balconies with far-reaching or garden views**Fitwel accredited scheme - prioritising the health and well-being of residentsFree Wi-Fi included in your rent**Selected units onlyStudioCosy, yet generously sized spaces, perfect for those living solo or as a couple. The best things come in small packages, that's why our studios are the perfect pad for those who live alone but still roomy enough for a couple to share. With large windows and luxurious wood-effect flooring the space is light and airy during the day but can be calming and cosy as you wind down for the evening.The kitchen boasts fully-integrated appliances  including oven, hob, microwave and separate washer/dryer housed in large storage cupboard. The studio comes complete with a dividing wall with door to separate the living and sleeping spaces for that extra level of privacy. The bedroom boasts a built-in wardrobe and leads through to the bathroom suite with a large bath with overhead shower, storage cabinets and heated towel rail.These apartments won't be around for long so enquire now to book your viewing and secure your future home!Please note: Our virtual tour is of our one bedroom show apartment.You can find out specific details on the Council Tax Band on the GOV website.Standard tenancy length of 12 months. Enquire with our team if you are looking for a longer tenancy. * All content, imagery and information contained in this listing are included for general marketing purposes only. They should not be relied on to provide an exact representation of the properties available. All photos and/or images used are for illustrative purposes; actual room layouts, sizes and colours may vary.

Our brand-new rental apartments are well-connected - a short drive from the motorway and walking distance of Watford station, making your commute quick and easy. You can be in central London in half an hour!Choose to make one of our apartments your new home, offering beautiful and practical spaces, custom designed for you to enjoy. Many also benefit from private balconies and far-reaching views. With designer finishes like natural stone worktops, modern soft close cabinetry and Elfa storage solutions. description: This is a lovely, terraced, 2 double bedroom house, with free parking at the far end of a peaceful estate. There is a separate kitchen, open plan dining/sitting room with French doors on to the private garden. In one of the double rooms, the King-sized bed converts to twins for flexibility and ease, there is a family bathroom and downstairs loo. Well-behaved pets welcome. Dedicated playground for the kiddies on site on this very friendly, family centred neighbourhood, the popular Brookwood Manor development built approximately 18 years ago by Bellway Homes. Freshly decorated and furnished this is a terrific spot on a cul de sac in a dedicated family oriented estate. Just across the road from the house is Brookwood Country Park which offers lovely walks with ponds and grassy areas. Have a stroll along the Basingstoke canal. Just along the road there is a Sainsburys superstore and a large Homebase both of which are a short walk away while an equally easy drive will take you into Knaphill village where there is a collection of local shops and restaurants. When you need something more comprehensive the centre of Woking is within easy reach and is currently undergoing significant regeneration that is seeing it take on a far more interesting and contemporary feel. Woking has a theatre, multi-screen cinema and what is widely regarded as one of the best commuting rail stations that can be found in the south east of England running into Waterloo in approximately 25 minutes. In and around the area there are excellent golf courses and schools catering for all ages.BrochuresStrathcona Gardens, Knaphill, Woking

description: This 2 Bedroom House is situated within 1 mile of Steyning High Street with its extensive range of shops, restaurants and facilities. The house has  two double bedrooms, a secluded rear garden, allocated parking space and is in a quiet location. The property is having some redecoration done.Just twelve miles west of Brighton and Hove, and with excellent transport links by car and train into London, this is the ideal setting for those who wish for the best of both worlds. The town with its rich history has good local shops, primary and secondary schools and recreational facilities including the local leisure centre with swimming pool, tennis courts and a Health Centre.  * A holding deposit of £300  is payable to secure this property  * A damage deposit of £1500 will be payable, along with the first rent payment, prior to moving in

description:
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Victoria, this is a 480 sq ft Manhattan-Style apartment on the first floor in one of Victoria's most recent new build developments.

Beautifully finished to an exceptional standard throughout, the apartment comprises a reception with wide floor-to-ceiling, a designer Italian kitchen and a modern bathroom with glazed aqua tiles.

The property features Oakwood flooring, computerised lighting system and underfloor heating throughout. 

Residents also benefit from 24 hour concierge services, gymnasium, sky garden with south facing views and a landscaped courtyard. 

Victoria is home to new retail, theatres, traditional pubs, fine restaurants and excellent transport links including Victoria Underground (Circle, District & Victoria lines) and Mainline Station. St James's Park Underground is moments away.

description: This state-of-the-art apartment consists of two double bedrooms with plenty of wardrobe space and under floor heating, an Italian designed bathroom with heated wall / floor, plus a spacious open plan living/kitchen area with a generous private balcony. The apartment also benefits from Siemens appliances, plus a large storage cupboard, complete with hanging rail.Amenities include a 24 hour concierge, fully equipped spa including swimming pool, sauna / steam room, a large communal roof terrace plus attractively planted courtyard areas throughout the development. Off street secure underground parking is available with this property.Situated opposite Battersea Park, Prince of Wales of Drive is in a prime location close to central London and only minutes away from Chelsea / Nine Elms. It is also adjacent to the iconic Battersea Power Station. Battersea Park is renowned for its timeless beauty, green open spaces and leisure activities, this prestigious development combines this beauty with great design, befitting of its position and surroundings.The transport links are excellent, with overground and underground access within a five minute walk, with the new Northern Line access at Battersea Power Station in full operation, enabling a commute time to the City in less than 15 minutes.Please call the LondonPropertyGuru lettings team now to arrange a viewing.
