description:
This property is available for long term or short term. 

A lovely four-bedroom family home in a quiet neighbourhood, this is a super, recently refurbished comfy spot with a garden, perfect for a family. Semi-detached, on a corner plot it has two reception rooms, open plan kitchen/dining room opening on to the secure garden. With four double bedrooms over the top two floors, two of which convert to twin rooms if desired, and two family-bathrooms. Parking is available on the side streets and pets are welcome! Spotlessly clean, and with all the essentials, you will find comfortable beds, lashings of hot water, whizzy wifi and a well-equipped kitchen. Arlington Estates are pleased to offer this well presented 3 bedroom maisonette in a highly desirable area in North London. The property is in a very good condition and comprises of 3 bedrooms, a large reception room, a kitchen/diner, family bathroom, and a guest WC.  The property is available furnished.

The property is set above commercial premises located within 2 minutes walk of Oakwood underground (Piccadilly line) station.  The property is situated in a very convenient position within half an hour from Kings Cross by tube yet has countryside feel.

The property is also within the catchment area of excellent primary and secondary schools.

Inspired from British & US pop culture, the Robinson has a unique, eclectic style expertly combining mid-century, art deco, and retro kitsch design with contemporary renters in mind.Each apartment centres around a bold, vibrant kitchen palette with great options to choose from (think red burgundy, mint blue to jaffa orange) and state-of-the-art Samsung home appliances. Smart layouts provide plenty of storage options for comfortable everyday living and if you feel you need extra space, make use of the secure storage pods.Take advantage of the wonderful common spaces for both work and play. There is an entire floor with exceptional views where you can plug in your laptop or perhaps book a work-from-home caravan up on the terrace. Enjoy one of the largest rooftop terraces in London, with smashing views of the stadium and the city. Check out the resident perks:  - Bespoke furniture collection  - State of the art Samsung appliances - Free superfast wifi  - Utilities all set up and ready to go. You get one monthly bill, easy - Resident gardens - An entire floor with dedicated working from Home lounges - Roof terrace with sun lounges, juice bar, and a slide! - Work from Home Caravans - Festival Gardens, a podium garden  - Pet-friendly - Partner perks: discounts and offers from carefully selected partners to make your everyday home life easier. From Zipcar and Aussie Man & Van to Sky and Bloom & WildThe landlord, Quintain Living, wants to create the best rental experience for you, with you. Benefit from a home where utilities are already set up and ready for you, without the commitment of putting down a deposit and no hidden fees. Manage utilities, book social spaces, maintenance and redeem local discounts in a few taps through the Quintain Living App.Enjoy the support of the awarded resident team, available 24/7 to help you truly enjoy your new home.* The development features a number of different apartments, with a variety of layouts and aspects. The photos and the floor plan are for illustration purposes only. Enquire now to organise a tour of our available apartments.Deposit free option available subject to Clearscore rating. If not a 5 weeks rent deposit will be required.*** ONE MONTH FREESelected apartments on a 12mth tenancy only. The price shown is based on ‘one month free’ offer spread across a 12mth tenancy. However, when you move in the offer will be discounted from your rent across the remainder of 2023 (so you feel the benefit earlier).

description: Regent are happy to present this stunning two-bedroom apartment located in the exclusive One Blackfriars development, transforming London's skyline. Situated among the capital's famous landmarks on the banks of the River Thames, the Tower at 558 feet is one of the tallest residential buildings in Europe.This modern two-bedroom apartment benefits from beautiful tiled flooring, with underfloor heating in the living areas, and a wrap-around winter garden with views across the Thames. The bedrooms enjoy plush carpeting and access to the winter gardens. The kitchen has been designed with high-specification integrated appliances.Indoor parking goes with the apartment!Residents will further benefit from a well-equipped fitness suite, with a 20m swimming pool, thermal suite, snow cabin, sauna, steam room, and access to a private cinema room.At 50 floors high, with residents' facilities in the basement levels, and an executive lounge at Level 32, the sheer beauty and purity of its design, One Blackfriars is creating a new focus on London's South Bank. Regent Property comply with the Tenant Fees Act 2019 and are members of The Property Ombudsman scheme. Our Client Money Protection is provided by the UKALA Total Loss CMP scheme. More info on our website or via telephone.

description:
Available to Let is this superb, TWO BEDROOM, ground floor apartment, located in a quiet and highly sought-after location, just off Eskdale Avenue in Chesham. Bennetts is a quiet, resident only, cul-de-sac and approximately ½ mile from Chesham Town Centre and the Metropolitan Line Station.

The apartment has been fully refurbished, including brand new carpets and a repaint throughout. 

The property is a perfect fit for a single or couple (sorry no families or pets). 

The front door of the property is accessed from the ground floor and the design to the rear offers a stunning elevated position giving wonderful views across local allotments and fields in the distance.

This excellent apartment also offers resident parking plus a large private garage with lights and electric

ACCOMMODATION OFFERS:
* Good Size Living Area with door out to private south facing patio area
* Good Size Dining Area with Bay Window and views over local allotments and distant fields
* Fitted Kitchen
* One  Double Bedroom
* One Single Bedroom, perfect for a dressing room, office or guest bedroom. 
* Bathroom 
* Gas Central Heating
* Double Glazed
* Patio area
* Garage
* Residents Parking
* Well Maintained Communal Gardens

Please note the property is for a single or couple only.
Sorry not suitable for families and no pets allowed.

Internal viewings highly recommended.BrochuresFull Details

description: Regent are delighted to present this spectacular two-bedroom apartment, which comprises two double bedrooms, a large open-plan reception area, a fully equipped kitchen, and two modern bathrooms. All the rooms are of exceptional size, with carpet to both the reception room and the bedrooms, the kitchen is fitted to a good standard with integrated appliances - including a full-size fridge-freezer, a dishwasher, and a washing machine - and the bathrooms are both modern and stylish. The apartment benefits from the use of facilities - including a gym, swimming pool, and sauna, all included - outdoor space by way of a communal courtyard, well-kept and fairly quiet, and secure parking is available. Its location is excellent, as it is in Waterloo, a short distance from the Southbank, with views across the River Thames to the Houses of Parliament and Embankment. Waterloo station is minutes away, served by the Jubilee, Northern, and Bakerloo Lines, as well as National Rail services, and is well-connected to all the City, Canary Wharf, and Stratford, as well as connections to South East and Southwest London, ideal for those commuting. Regent Property comply with the Tenant Fees Act 2019 and are members of The Property Ombudsman scheme. Our Client Money Protection is provided by the UKALA Total Loss CMP scheme. For more information please visit our website or call our office on the number above.

description:
This extremely well presented, newly painted FOUR BEDROOM, TWO BATHROOM semi detached home is positioned opposite the ever popular Grimsdyke First & Middle school, being a short walk to Hatch End's array of sought after restaurants and overground station allowing swift access into Central London. 

ACCOMMODATION: Entrance hall, lounge area, dining area, modern kitchen (with appliances including integrated dishwasher), bedroom two, bedroom three (with range of fitted wardrobes), bedroom four, modern bathroom with built in shower above bath, stairs leading second floor, master bedroom and separate modern shower room/WC.  BENEFITS include: Gas/CH, D/Glazing, alarm, single garage via own drive, off street parking for two cars, laminate flooring and large rear garden with outdoor lighting. N.B Garden office is not included.
